diagonally<br>- MEDIUM: search horizontally, vertically, diagonally and backwards<br>- HARD: search horizontally, vertically, diagonally, backwards and just a clue about the word</p><p>Focusing on class="description">  第一名團圓派對神器"超級比一比"~ 全家一起笑翻天~! 還可以把歡樂影片分享到臉書~<p>一推出就讓人驚笑聲連連、狂笑到流淚，讓你樓上揪樓下，三五好友相聚必備的APP良品「超級比一比」，熱鬧登場！iOS突破15萬人下載，安心亞...等偶像藝人都愛玩，快揪大家動起來，瘦身、搞笑、聯絡感情，三個願望一次達成。 <br>驚爆！！等比賽等的無聊不知道幹嘛嗎？全新新增世足題卡！一起來為你最愛的國家加油吧！！<br>(本遊戲需手機配置前鏡頭，並有錄音功能，系統4.0以上，才能享用遊戲內規畫的各項服務) </p><p>● 超級比一比遊戲方式 : 簡單易上手 </p><p>1. 點擊要挑戰的「遊戲卡」後，按【Play】進入遊戲。 </p><p>2. 和你的隊友分配角色： <br>(1) 一位負責猜題，拿手機放胸前或頭上。 <br>(2) 其他隊友負責看題目比動作。 </p><p>3. 在限定60秒內，盡情比手畫腳。 <br>(1) 答對 = 請將畫面向"下"翻轉 <br>(2) 放棄 = 請將畫面向"上"翻轉 </p><p>4. 遊戲結束成績結算。 </p><p>5. 可觀看主持人錄製的影片，還有精彩小評。 </p><p>● 遊戲特色 </p><p>1. 題目類型用心在設計！ <br>特別推薦：超爆笑的「趣味」遊戲卡，免費體驗唷！ </p><p>2. 遊戲過程別出心裁 <br>記錄每一分每一秒大家的歡笑與感動。 </p><p>3. 大人小孩都熱愛 <br>還有更多驚人的小秘密，就等大家來體驗小驚喜。 </p><p>● 玩法密技 </p><p>1. 入門初心者 <br>建議選擇「職業」題庫，扭腰擺臀演活角色；可做出招牌動作讓對方更好猜唷! </p><p>2. 團體搞笑大亂鬥 <br>建議可以一人猜，多人同時演出，增加趣味度。 </p><p>3. 玩樂做學習 <br>可以用英文來提示，搭配肢體表演，但嚴禁單字直譯，這樣太犯規啦！ </p><p>4. 一張嘴走透透 <br>用臉部表情加嘴型來說出答案，給對方猜，不可發生聲音。 </p><p>如果還有更多種創意玩法，分享到粉絲團，一起high一下..... 支持統計跟踪</p><p>遊戲規則：<br>數獨是一種基於邏輯推理的數字填充謎題。遊戲目標是用1到9這9個數字填滿一個9x9的方格，使得每一行、每一列以及每一個3x3的子方格都包含1到9這9個數字。</p><p>---</p><p>Sudoku Master is #1 Sudoku game available in Google Play with beautiful graphics and killer features.</p><p>Sudoku Master has been polished to perfection and boasts an intuitive, touch screen game play which makes you never need a paper puzzle again. Now challenge yourself to more than 2000 puzzles and 4 levels of difficulty from Easy to Expert!</p><p>Game Features:<br>- Two modes - Classic &amp; Casual (auto remove the wrong numbers)<br>- 4 Levels - Easy, Normal, Hard, Expert<br>- Smooth interface and Impressive graphics<br>- Auto-save &amp; Resume<br>- Smart Notes (pencil marks)<br>- Error checking (incorrect entry highlighting)<br>- Selected digit highlighting<br>- Statistics tracking</p><p>Game Rules:<br>Sudoku is a logic-based number-placement puzzle. The objective is to fill a 9 9 grid with digits so that each column, each row, and each of the nine 3×3 sub-grids contains all of the digits from 1 to 9.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.popzhang.sudoku" aria-hidden="true" </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  花式成语接龙是传统接龙和填字结合的一款语言文字游戏。我们把精选的成语串成各种形状， 而你需要从备选的字里选择并完成整个接龙。一个地方过不去，其他地方也接不起来，极大考验您的词汇量和发散思维。<p>1. 精心挑选的海量词汇，题目不断增加中，目前已有100关。<br>2. 有趣的升级系统，你可以从童生一直升级到翰林文圣。难度会越来越大哦。<br>3. 速度奖励，考验你的思维敏捷和操作速度。</p><p>和歇后语，灯谜，对联，名间故事一样，成语是最最体现中国古老文化的元素。快来和好友一起体验中国古老文化-成语的魅力，还可以通过微信分享，求助和挑战你的朋友们，看看谁才是才高八斗，学富五车的才子佳人。</p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" This unique game is a mixture of anagrams and puzzle, and will keep you busy for a long time!<br>The rules are simple: there is a hidden word (or a hidden sentence) and you have to move the letters around in order to find it. It looks easy...and yet!<br>All the words/sentences have been carefully selected so that you will never have to deal with "impossible" words that only exist in the dictionary. There is a coins system that will ensure that you never get stuck: you get rewarded for passing each level so that you can buy your way through the most difficult levels (and if you reach zero coins...you can activate the autorefill function, that will give you some free coins a few hours later). href="/store/apps/details?id=com.berniiiiiiii.tekatekisilang" title="Teka Teki Silang">    Teka Teki Silang  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Berni+Mobile" title="Berni Mobile">Berni Mobile</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.berniiiiiiii.tekatekisilang"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKQonEiUKH2NvbS5iZXJuaWlpaWlpaWkudGVrYXRla2lzaWxhbmcQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Teka-teki silang yang mantap!<br> - Bahasa Indonesia.<br> - Atur ukuran kotak, mulai 3x3 hingga 25x25.<br> - Game dengan kombinasi tak terbatas.<br> - Kotak akan terisi kata untuk ditebak.<br> - Ukuran kotak disesuaikan dengan perangkat.<br> - Jumlah kata yang berlimpah<br> - Game yang mendidik dan seru<br> - Tiga level.<p>"Teka-teki silang atau disingkat TTS adalah suatu permainan di mana kita harus mengisi ruang-ruang kosong (berbentuk kotak putih) dengan huruf-huruf yang membentuk sebuah kata berdasarkan petunjuk yang diberikan. Petunjuknya biasa dibagi ke dalam kategori 'mendatar' dan 'menurun' tergantung arah kata-kata yang harus diisi.</p><p>Sejarah</p><p>Pada 2 Desember 1913, Arthur Wynne menerbitkan TTS dalam majalah New York World dengan format seperti yang kita kenal saat ini. Teka-teki ini, yang bisa dilihat di situs web Crossword Tournament, sering disebut sebagai TTS pertama, dan Wynne sebagai penemunya.</p><p>TTS kemudian menjadi fitur mingguan di majalah tersebut. Buku kumpulan TTS pertama terbit pada 1924, diterbitkan oleh Simon and Schuster.[rujukan?] Bukunya terbukti laris dan TTS menjadi salah satu benda terpopuler pada tahun 1924.</p><p>Pada tahun 1970-an di Jakarta terbit "Asah Otak", sebuah majalah TTS dan berbagai teka-teki lainnya. Penerbitan ini ternyata sukses sehingga banyak terbitan serupa yang segera mengikutinya." Wikipedia</p><p><br>Firman permainan , puzzle , gratis permainan ★ Indonesian crossword  ★ lawat teka teki lucu</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a Word Search Free  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=NotyxGames" title="NotyxGames">NotyxGames</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.notyx.wordsearch"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHgocEhoKFGNvbS5ub3R5eC53b3Jkc2VhcmNoEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  WORD SEARCH PUZZLE IN ENGLISH:<p>Welcome to the best auto-generated word search application for Android:</p><p>The Word Search of NotyxGames is ideal for hours of entertainment and train our mind. It is suitable for both adults and children, since the game includes topics as "Kids", created especially for them.</p><p><br>1.- Word search has 10 items to choose from:</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;- Animals<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;- Countries of the World<br>     - Historical figures<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;- Cities of the World<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;- American presidents<br>     - Kids<br>     - Trademarks<br>     - Astronomy<br>     - Chemical elements<br>     - Fruits, vegetables and mushrooms</p><p><br>2.- Word search has six levels of difficulty:</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;- Very easy (grid 6x)<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;- Easy ( Grid 8x)<br>     - Normal (Grid 10x)<br>     - Difficult (Grid 15x)<br>     - Very difficult (Grid 20x)<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;- Auto adjust</p><p><br>3.- Word search has two game modes:</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;- List of words (words to find the slopes shown)<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;- Remaining number of words (the number of words to find earrings shown)</p><p><br>4.- Has two methods of self-generation:</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;- The maximum number possible (the board is filled with the maximum number of words)<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;- Limited (the board is filled with a number proportional to the size of the words)</p><p>5.- Is available in many languages:</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;- Catalan<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;- Spanish<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;- English<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;- Italian<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;- French<br>     - Deutsch<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;- Portuguese</p><p><br>THE GAME: WORD SEARCH</p><p>Choose the difficult..... and you can play.</p><p>Gameplay is very simple; because they are hidden words in a grid of cells filled with letters.</p><p>All you have to do is search for a word, and when you find one, mark it with the finger from the first letter to the last. By doing so, if the word is correct it will be marked with a distinctive color and you'll can search the next</p><p>The palindrome words, that is, which is also read from right to left and left to right, starting can be labeled either ends.</p><p>NOTE: Sometimes are generated at random, unexpected words; especially if they are very short (2 or 3 letters); on these occasions, if the word appears in the dictionary of the topic, when you mark the word, this is added to the list of words and is marked with a distinctive colour.</p><p><br>SCORE</p><p>Complete the game, calculates your score and stores your best times.</p><p><br>INFINITE GAME</p><p>Also, if you can not finish the game, do not worry, when you get back can choose to start a new game or continue the game as you left 身為成語皇朝中的居民，你(妳)是否可以通過各地州府嚴格的審查，發揮所學，<br> 從原本平民的身分，一步步邁向皇朝百官的最高峰，甚至有可能問鼎下任皇帝大<br> 位？<br> 現在，就展開你的皇朝科舉之路吧！<br> 成語皇朝是一款適合全家人的教育類遊戲<br> –使用字詞搜尋，或是搖晃設備找到您想要學習的成語，以提高您的<br>成語知識。<br> 官場排名 –看看目前自己在全世界的排名是多少，也可以就本地排名來了解自<br>己的實力。</p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" 《疯狂猜字谜》是一款传统的益智游戏，根据一段简洁明了、生动形象、通俗易懂的文字猜出它所描述的汉字，有趣而又刺激，同时也可以考验一下自己对中国汉字了解的程度，老少皆宜。<br>猜字谜也是汉民族特有的一种语言文化现象，它主要是根据方块汉字笔画繁复、偏旁相对独立，结构组合多变的特点，运用离合、增损、象形、会意等多种方式来进行，显得既有趣味，又有知识内涵。看起来是不是觉得很深奥呢？那就加入《疯狂猜字谜》的队伍，一起体验一下这款层次较高的文字娱乐活动吧。 href="/store/apps/details?id=com.eekgames.worddrop" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.eekgames.worddrop" title="Dropwords"> 57.    Dropwords  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Ben+Garrett" title="Ben Garrett">Ben Garrett</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.eekgames.worddrop"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHwodEhsKFWNvbS5lZWtnYW1lcy53b3JkZHJvcBABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Dropwords is word-finding puzzle that combines some elements of Scrabble and Boggle. Valid words boost your score and the dwindling timer; used letters disappear and new ones drop from above.<p>"Dropwords is a potent mixture of Scrabble, Boggle and Bejeweled! - Editor's Pick from AppEggs.com"</p><p>The game includes six game modes: Normal, Hard, Lightning, Blocker, Relax and Untimed. Whether you just want to relax, or are looking for something challenging, there's a game mode that will suit you.</p><p>The game offers three dictionaries:<br>1. Scrabble: contains all the 2-to-8-letter words from the SOWPODS list of Scrabble competition words. This amounts to 114575 words, including both US and UK spellings. Because this is a Scrabble dictionary, proper nouns like "June" or "Rome" are not included. Plurals are included.<br>2. Webster's: based on the Webster's New International Dictionary, 2nd Edition, this contains 87416 2-to-8-letter words. Includes some proper nouns, but not plurals or Scrabble-specific words (such as my own favourite, "QI"!). I have added certain words that seemed to be missing in error: BOX, HAS, KID, NEAR.<br>3. Both! The combination of the Scrabble and Webster's dictionaries, comprising 153136 words. This is the dictionary used by default.</p><p>You can switch dictionary via the game's Options dialog.</p><p>Includes optional access to PapayaMobile's social network, global leaderboards, and achievements!</p><p>Have fun!</p><p>* Note to Samsung Galaxy S2 owners: there is a known fault with this dual-core phone where sound playback can cause crashes and/or freezes. Please ensure the game's "Mute sound" option is ticked (in the Options dialog, accessible from the highscores screen). *</p><p>Coming soon:<br>1. As you dig down, Worm will follow until you can guide him to the bottom before time runs out. You need to be able to make words quickly to string together bonuses, as well as just to clear the path. WordWow will sharpen your brain as well as your reflexes. </p><p>If you find Worm to be stuck and you can't come up with any words, you can use a bomb to clear some of the tiles.   You have a limited number of bombs, but you can earn more as you make more words.   As Worm moves down the board, more letters become available.</p><p>Some levels have a hidden gem behind one of the tiles, and if you can find all the gems in all the levels of a world, a bonus level is opened where you can really rack up the points!</p><p>The bigger the words that you can make the more points you'll earn.   Try and make enough points each level to earn all three stars.</p><p>Help a worm out! </p><p>Features: <br>* 140,000 word dictionary (from official Scrabble dictionary)<br>* Fast word finding action Classic Words Solo  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Lulo+Apps" title="Lulo Apps">Lulo Apps</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.lulo.scrabble.classicwords"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKAomEiQKHmNvbS5sdWxvLnNjcmFiYmxlLmNsYXNzaWN3b3JkcxABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Classic Words Solo is the number one word game to play against your Android phone or tablet (solitaire mode). Enrich your vocabulary thanks to the built-in word definitions!<br>6 difficulty levels and languages are supported: English, Spanish, French, Italian, German and Dutch.<p>**** Exclusive features of Classic Words Plus (the paid version): ****<br>- Pass-and-Play mode for 2 players<br>- Ad-free experience<br>- Preview your score before validating a move<br>***************************************************</p><p>Tired of stumbling across cheaters or waiting hours for your online opponent to play on Scrabble, Words with friends or Wordfeud?<br>Try out Classic Words Solo for instant fun, no matter if you are a beginner in crossword games or a Scrabble tournament player!</p><p>Choose the skill level of the computer (from beginner to expert), pick a word list (English word lists include Scrabble (TWL and SOWPODS) and Words With Friends official words), and use your strategy skills and vocabulary to try and defeat the Droid.</p><p>Classic Words Solo gameplay is classical to crosswords board games: create and place words on the board and boost your score by placing letters on the high scoring Double Letter, Double Word, Triple Letter and Triple Word squares.<br>Use all 7 letters from your rack to play a Bingo and get a 50 points bonus.</p><p>This game is a great time killer for all fans of board games and strategy games. It is also an educational game that will allow kids (and adults :-) ) to improve their spelling and vocabulary. </p><p>Thanks to the fast reactivity and variable skill of the computer and official word lists, Classic Words can be used by Words With Friends or Scrabble enthusiasts to play quick training matches and learn new words from the computer's moves.</p><p>Unlike with multiplayer board games where some dishonest players use anagram solvers, there is no cheating possible when playing solitaire... Letters and blanks are always picked randomly, and the computer's artificial intelligence does not have more information than you do.</p><p>Only your tactics and creativity can make the difference...<br>Will you play strategically enough to outwit the computer and its extensive vocabulary?</p><p>**** Features ****<br>- 6 levels of difficulty<br>- Display the definition of words by swiping them<br>- Save game state when quitting application<br>- Shake to shuffle<br>- Languages and dictionaries supported:<br>   - English<br>      - SOWPODS 2012 (Official English tournament list)<br>      - TWL06 (Official list)<br>      - Words With Friends (2012 version)<br>   - German (with support of Umlauts, and Ezset to be replaced by two 'S')<br>   - French (Officiel du Scrabble, ODS5)<br>   - Italian (Zingarelli)<br>   - Spanish (DRAE)<br>   - Dutch<br>- Distribution of letters and points are adapted to the language<br>- Supports offline play</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.lulo.scrabble.classicwords" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.halomobi.cantonese" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.halomobi.cantonese" title="我愛廣東話 － 瘋狂查字典(卡關可上面書問)"> 62.    我愛廣東話 － 瘋狂查字典(卡關可上面書問)  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=chinchins" title="chinchins">chinchins</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.halomobi.cantonese"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIAoeEhwKFmNvbS5oYWxvbW9iaS5jYW50b25lc2UQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  “我愛廣東話”是一款全中文的益智休閒遊戲，你可以體現廣東的語言文化。還可以學習最新的潮流術語。讓你和別人溝通沒有隔膜。<p>廣東話的文化，源遠流長，當中的精髓未必可以一時三刻學習得到。無論是俗語或潮語，都希望你猜過後開懷一笑。</p><p>遊戲玩法：<br>－ 根據一張圖或一句提示，找出正確的俗語或潮語<br>－ 字與字之間必須要相連<br>－ 找到正確的答案後，長按0.5秒便能過關<br>快來試試吧！</p><p>粵語，又作廣東話，是一種屬漢藏語系漢語族的聲調語言，也是漢族廣府民系的母語。粵語根源於中原雅言，含完整的九聲六調，較完美地保留古漢語特徵，同時也是保留中古漢語最完整的語言。在學術界，它是除普通話外唯一在外國大學有獨立研究的中國語言。</p><p>粵語以珠江三角洲為分佈中心，在中國的廣東、廣西、海南、香港、澳門，北美、歐洲和澳洲、新西蘭、聖誕島等以及東南亞的新加坡、印度尼西亞、馬來西亞、越南等華人社區中廣泛使用。在粵語核心地區廣東省近8000萬本地人口中，粵語使用者近4000萬；也有媒體認為，在廣東省的1億人口中，使用人數超過6700萬。同時粵方言也向內地和其他民系方言區滲透輻射，說明它仍俱生機活力，這是粵方言區在經濟上較為發達和商業活動十分活躍的反映。</p><p>粵語是香港、澳門的官方語言，美國、加拿大的第三大語言，澳洲的第四大語言。粵語，承載著上古漢語的遺風，悠悠粵韻，是嶺南文化的最重要載體，是維繫廣府人的最重要橋樑，也是廣府民系興旺發達的最重要保證。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> Pinoy Henyo  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Jayson+Tamayo" title="Jayson Tamayo">Jayson Tamayo</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.jsonmat.pinoyhenyo"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIAoeEhwKFmNvbS5qc29ubWF0LnBpbm95aGVueW8QARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Pinoy Henyo is a word and mind game popularized in the Philippine’s No. 1 noon-time variety show, Eat Bulaga. The mechanics of the game is actually very simple. The guesser will hold his phone on his forehead and he will just need to guess the word.<p>It is played by pair. The guesser and the one will give three short answers: YES (Oo), NO (Hindi) or CAN BE (Puwede).<br>If the guesser got the word, tap the middle screen to stop the timer.</p><p>Quick play – This is the fastest way to play Pinoy Henyo. Words will come from all categories.</p><p>Custom Play – Here you can customize the word to be guessed, set the guessing time and you can also choose a random word from a specific category.</p><p>Super Pinoy Henyo – Beware! All words in this gameplay are the hardest to guess.</p><p>Words – You can edit and add a word to guess.</p><p>Settings – Here you can change the default guessing time and the word’s font.</p><p>DISCLAIMER: This application is NOT, in any way, related to Eat Bulaga!. 古诗词新玩法，创造性文字游戏。让你体会古人炼字造句的高明，享受自己组合诗歌的快乐。不会诗歌也能过关噢。<p>每首诗的文字都像棋子一样放置在一个位置，其中很多是乱序的，你需要通过两两交换的方式，在规定步数内，把所有的文字都放到正确的位置。为了游戏的趣味性，我们还为一些字加入了特性，比如一排全消，一列全消等。你首先得猜测这是哪首诗。不会背诵整首诗怎么办？你可以通过查看译文，查看标题，答案提示等方式一步一步猜测。其中乐趣，喜欢文字的你一定懂的。你还可以通过里面的“搜索”功能，在百度搜索整首诗，了解其全部背景帮助你赏析全诗。</p><p>精选200余首经典诗词，包括语文课本里出现的，唐诗三百首，爱情诗歌，写景诗歌等。希望这款游戏能带你走进唯美的古诗词文字世界，体会古人独特的文思和才情。</p><p></p> The words You have not guessed are marked in red. If You like word games, like scrabble, You will like this game. <br>The game uses dictionary which contains nouns, verbs, plurals and also may contain some unfamiliar words. But anyway You can look up the definition of every word You want, when the game time is up or You press "Give Up" button. <br>When You guess word with length of 3 letters, You get 3 points and additional 10 seconds. <br>Similarly word with length of 4 letters gives you 4 points and additional 15 seconds,<br>Word with length of 5 letters gives You 5 points and additional 20 seconds.<br>Word Unless you understand them and their TRUE relationship, Korean characters just would be chunks of emoticons, or hieroglyphics. Like these: 웃 유 홋 </p><p>No, you shouldn't stop there! Here this guy: 웃 Ut-man, the Korean Hangman, will help you from the basic of Korean language.<br>If you ever played word game, hangman, you probably know that it is one of the the easiest way and keep you interested to learn words. Korean as well. Unlike English or Chinese, Korean language, Hangul has very unique character system. It is consist of Jaum and Moum like consonant and vowel. However, it is practically separated by Chosung, Jungsung and Jongsung. You cannot fully understand how it works only by reading Korean articles. You should understand which element does which job in a single character. This application will teach you how Korean language works!</p><p>Now do not be frustrated while watching Korean TV drama and music show. Check the latest expression by playing Hangman! With Ut-man you can see all pronunciation for each words. You finally know how to read Korean!</p><p>Don't know how to type Korean keyboard? Don't worry we provide easiest custom Korean keyboard. href="/store/apps/details?id=jp.funsolution.benkyo" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=jp.funsolution.benkyo" title="べんきょう！ 【青春満喫放置ゲームアプリ】"> 86.    べんきょう！ 【青春満喫放置ゲームアプリ】  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=%E6%A0%AA%E5%BC%8F%E4%BC%9A%E7%A4%BE+Creative+Freaks" title="株式会社 Creative Freaks">株式会社 Creative Freaks</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="jp.funsolution.benkyo"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHwodEhsKFWpwLmZ1bnNvbHV0aW9uLmJlbmt5bxABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  勉強の果てに待つ衝撃と感動のエンディングを貴方に…<p>======================================<br>べんきょう！って?<br>======================================</p><p>がんばる学生応援ゲーム　べんきょう！　〜しんどい〜　は、<br>恋愛ADVゲームと放置ゲームというメジャーな二つのジャンルを組み合わせた、<br>完全無料でプレイできる、豪華フルボイス仕様の青春満喫放置ゲームアプリです。</p><p>======================================<br>こんな人、シチュエーションの方にオススメ！<br>======================================</p><p>・勉学やお仕事の息抜き<br>・通学、通勤時などの暇つぶし<br>・優等生、リア充気分を味わいたい方<br>・ちょっとリアルな女性の反応や変化を楽しみたい方<br>・お手軽にマルチシナリオ型のゲームを楽しみたい方<br>======================================<br>ゲーム内容<br>======================================</p><p>あなたは中学三年生の優等生。<br>毎日勉学やスポーツに明け暮れ、周囲の羨望のまなざしを浴びています。<br>・・・そんなあなたを熱い視線で見つめている一人の女の子がいました。</p><p>幼なじみの同級生。地味めなメガネっ娘、成宮里奈ちゃんです。</p><p>彼女は真剣なまなざしであなたに訴えます。</p><p><br>「あなたと同じ高校に行きたい！」と…。</p><p>まるで子供の頃から実の妹のように可愛がってきた彼女の誘いを断る事は出来ません。</p><p>あなたは里奈と共に一流私立高校への入学を目指すことになるのですが・・・<br>彼女には大きな弱点があったのです。</p><p>その正体は…　”居眠り”　です。</p><p>彼女は勉強が大の苦手です。<br>某漫画の主人公の○太のの０．９３秒には及びませんが、１５秒程度で熟睡してしまいます。<br>もはや病気です。このままではまるで勉強になりません。</p><p>彼女の眠りの元凶である、【眠気バブル】を破壊し、優しく起こしてあげてください。<br>共に居眠り…じゃなかった、勉学に励むことで、彼女はあなたとの思い出を育みながら、<br>一歩一歩自分の人生を歩んで行く事でしょう。</p><p>このゲームは、どこにでもいる…ごく普通の現代社会に生きる女の子の成長を楽しむ放置型ゲームです。</p><p>======================================<br>コンセプト<br>======================================</p><p>萌えというジャンルの表現手法に一石を投じるべく開発したのがこの作品です。</p><p>本作品はエンターテインメントとしての面白さを殺さない範囲で、リアルに現代の等身大の女性を描く事に挑戦した作品です。<br>良くある萌え萌えなキャラのリアクションや演出に飽きた方。</p><p>・・・ぜひ本作品をお試しください。</p><p>本作品では現代社会における思春期の少女の成長を心体両面から社会風刺を交えてコミカルに描きました。<br>誰でも手軽に簡単に遊ぶ事ができることはもちろん、何度も繰り返して遊ぶ事も出来るよう、やり込み要素もご用意してお待ちしております。</p><p>また、放置ゲームはすでに完成されたジャンルですが、一本道のゲームが殆どです。<br>ゲームの面白さの本質とはプレイヤーの選択による結果の分岐にあります。</p><p>そこで、本作品では繰り返し遊ぶ事ができるよう複数の攻略ルートをご用意致しました。</p><p>人生とは日々勉強である。そんなテーマを形にしたのが本作品です。</p><p>あなたの選択で、”彼女”の人生が変わります。</p><p>======================================<br>対応機種<br>======================================<br>iPhone4S, iPhone5, iPhone5S, iPhone6 で動作確認済み(iPhone4S以前の機種での動作は保障いたしません)<br>対応OS iOS 7.0以上</p><p>べんきょう!公式サイト http://benkyou.info/ </p><p>企画・開発<br>	株式会社 Creative Freaks<br>	URL: Ruzzle Adventure  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=MAG+Interactive" title="MAG Interactive">MAG Interactive</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="se.maginteractive.ruzzleadventure"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKwopEicKIXNlLm1hZ2ludGVyYWN0aXZlLnJ1enpsZWFkdmVudHVyZRABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Ruzzle Adventure is made by the creators of the world’s most popular word game, Ruzzle!<p>Play hundreds of challenging word puzzles in an adventure that will take you to 3 different worlds and +150 levels. </p><p>In every level there is a unique board with a different word challenge to solve.</p><p>Swipe your finger across the game board and make words; with every word you will be able to crush stones, escape rising water and gain as many points as possible to achieve one, two or three stars! Longer words can give you more points and free boosters.</p><p>On Ruzzle Adventure you can play alone at your own pace or you can do it with your friends: ask them for lives to make more words or compete for the highest score.</p><p>What can you expect from Ruzzle Adventure?</p><p>- Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to get all stars<br>- Hundreds of mind boggling levels to keep you thinking<br>- Boosters to help you with those challenging levels<br>- Be fast or slow: the game speed is up to you<br>- Leaderboards for you and your friends: who is the best coming up with words on Ruzzle Adventure?<br>- Practice your words and vocabulary in 12 languages: English, French, German, Spanish, Italian, Danish, Norwegian, Dutch, Swedish, Brazilian Portuguese, Turkish and Russian</p><p>We guarantee you'll have a great time and at the same time you'll practice your vocabulary and spelling-ability.</p><p>Follow us on Facebook or Twitter to:<br>- Get weekly tips and tricks on how to get better at Ruzzle Adventure<br>- Let us know how to improve Ruzzle Adventure. href="/store/apps/details?id=com.Happygamer.Wolfschool" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.Happygamer.Wolfschool" title="脱出！人狼学園-ひとりで遊べる人狼ゲーム-"> 89.    脱出！人狼学園-ひとりで遊べる人狼ゲーム-  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=%E3%83%8F%E3%83%83%E3%83%94%E3%83%BC%E3%82%B2%E3%83%BC%E3%83%9E%E3%83%BC%E6%A0%AA%E5%BC%8F%E4%BC%9A%E7%A4%BE" title="ハッピーゲーマー株式会社">ハッピーゲーマー株式会社</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.Happygamer.Wolfschool"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIwohEh8KGWNvbS5IYXBweWdhbWVyLldvbGZzY2hvb2wQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  ★ 累計60,000ダウンロード突破！ ★<br>★ 今大人気の人狼ゲームをはじめてみよう！ ★<p>****ひとりで遊べて、笑える人狼アプリが登場！****<br>Ｔ都S市に存在するというとある男子寮。<br>そこで一人の生徒が、人狼に噛みつかれてしまう（「アッー！」される）という事件が発生する。犠牲者は口を閉ざしたまま学舎を去ったが、寮の中にはまだ他の生徒達をアッー！しようと企む、人の皮を被った狼が潜んでいるのかもしれないのだ。君は寮の一員となり、善良な学生と人狼を見分けて、人狼を排除していかなければならない。</p><p>※本作中の「アッー！」は、人狼に噛み付かれるといった意味合いの造語であり、それ以外の意味を何ら含んでおりません。</p><p><br>****人狼ゲームとは？****<br>テレビなど、各メディアでも取り上げられている人気のパーティーゲームです。</p><p>10人～20人が集まり、その中に”人狼”が紛れ込んでいますが、誰が人狼なのか、人狼自身とその仲間にしか分かりません。</p><p>人狼は、夜になると人間を食べていってしまう恐ろしい存在です。<br>プレイヤー達は、占いや議論しながらこの”人狼”を見つけ出し、見事”処刑”する事で人間が勝利する事ができます。<br>逆に、人狼を見つけ出せなかった場合、正体を隠していた人狼が勝利を収めてしまいます。<br>誰が人狼かわからないドキドキ感、自分が人狼になった時の緊張感がやみつきに！</p><p>その人狼ゲームを、1人でカジュアルに楽しめる本格的アプリこそが、「脱出！人狼学園-ひとりで遊べる人狼ゲーム-」なのです。</p><p><br>****かんたん！　遊び方****<br>・学生を無差別にアッー！してしまう人狼を寮から減らしていきましょう。<br>・生徒達は投票により、人狼と思わしき人物を寮から追放できます。<br>・人狼は、毎夜学生をアッー！して、再起不能にしていきます。<br>・誰が人狼なのか、ハッカーや委員長の力をかりて、推理しよう！<br>・さあ人狼脱出ゲームを…やらないか？</p><p><br>****　役職の紹介　****<br>・学生<br>特別な力も趣味もない、普通の男子です。</p><p>・人狼<br>哀れな学生男子を毎夜アッー！する邪悪で、悪夢のような存在です。<br>参加人数に比例して数が増えます。<br>他の誰が人狼かがわかります。</p><p>・ハッカー<br>夜の間に男子の中の１人を選んでPCをハッキングする事で、人狼かどうかを調べる事ができます。セキュリティは無意味です。</p><p>・委員長<br>全ての男子生徒の連絡先を知っており、追放された男子が、学生か人狼か、男子の親に聞いて調べることができます。</p><p>・カップル<br>お互いをベスト♂パートナーと認めた二人です。<br>邪悪な人狼を憎むカップルは学生達の味方です。</p><p>・レスリング部<br>学生を一人だけ、人狼のアッー！から守る事が出来ます。<br>ただし、自分自身を守ることはできません。</p><p>・狂人<br>人狼に加担するBLackな危険人物です。人狼の勝利時は、狂人も勝利になります。<br>誰が人狼かを把握していませんが、議論を混乱させるために嘘をつきます。</p><p><br>・茂美<br>茂美とは男子寮にもぐり込んだ謎の人物です。<br>美しい彼女は人狼にアッー！されませんが、<br>怖い彼女がゲーム終了条件（全人狼追放など）を満たして<br>いるときに残っていると、茂美の単独完全勝利となります。<br>でも対策はあります。彼女はハッキングされると恥ずか<br>しさのあまり、学校を去ってしまいます。<br>よかったですね。<br>うまれてきてよかった！</p><p><br>****　ここがポイント！　****<br>・登録不要、課金要素一切なし、お手軽に遊べる！<br>・ひとりでできるので、暇つぶしにも最適のおもしろアプリ。<br>・おもしろネタ、ちょっと怖い話が満載！<br>・イケメンや、美少女（のようなかわいい男の娘)、本気のガチキャラなど多彩なキャラクターが登場！</p><p><br>****　公式サイト　****<br>攻略情報や、フリー素材も配信中！<br>http://ahhhh.happygamer.co.jp/</p><p><br>****　公式ツイッター　****<br>フォロワーになって、最新情報をチェックしよう！<br>https://twitter.com/infoahhhh</p><p><br>****　表現について　****<br>※本作中の「アッー！」は、人狼に噛み付かれるといった意味合いの造語であり、それ以外の意味を何ら含んでおりません。<br>また本アプリにはどのような社会的意図も含まれておらず、<br>一般の娯楽作品と同様に差別等を助長するものではありません。</p><p><br>****　より人狼学園を楽しむには　****<br>色々な役職を体験してみよう！<br>人狼、ハッカー、委員長、レスリング部、狂人、茂美でのプレイは、<br>「カスタムプレイ　→　難易度：むずかしい・絶望」で可能となります。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> Word Tunnel  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Ben+Garrett" title="Ben Garrett">Ben Garrett</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.eekgames.worddigger"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIQofEh0KF2NvbS5lZWtnYW1lcy53b3JkZGlnZ2VyEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  From the makers of Dropwords, Word Tunnel is word-finding puzzle.  Dig your way down the tunnel - used letter tiles crack and break, revealing new ones below.  Gold and silver tiles at deeper levels have score multipliers.<p>The game can be played against the clock, or in a more slow paced and thoughtful turn-based mode.  An untimed mode is also included.</p><p>The game offers three dictionaries, selectable via the game's Options dialog:<br>1. Scrabble: contains all the 2-to-8-letter words from the SOWPODS list of Scrabble competition words. This amounts to 114575 words, including both US and UK spellings. Because this is a Scrabble dictionary, proper nouns like "June" or "Rome" are not included. Plurals are included.<br>2. Webster's: based on the Webster's New International Dictionary, 2nd Edition, this contains 120127 2-to-9-letter words. Includes some proper nouns, but not plurals or Scrabble-specific words (such as my own favourite, "QI"!).<br>3. Both! The combination of the Scrabble and Webster's dictionaries; this is the dictionary used by default.</p><p>Have fun!</p><p>More game modes are coming soon! 史上最难文字游戏  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=%E5%85%B3%E9%A2%96" title="关颖">关颖</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="air.com.ctaigy2013.llld"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIQofEh0KF2Fpci5jb20uY3RhaWd5MjAxMy5sbGxkEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  无论是幼儿园、小学、初中、高中、大学、教授、专家，把新华字典里所有的字考你一遍，你总有不认识的。 <p>为什么世界人民纹身爱纹中国字，中国字牛就牛在构成上。为什么日文、韩文都是由中国字衍生出来，不是由字母组成的，也是因为中国文字的伟大。中国一个字代表的东西，你要用英文写，得写一长串。比如说“龙”字，好写吧！英文你就得写“dragon”六个字母。 </p><p>全民找汉字，不是说让你不认识中国字，而是让你更理解中国字，从游戏中感觉到汉字的伟大。 </p><p>我把文字拆分一些偏旁，然后再用这些偏旁去组字。发现的是什么？变化真是太多太多了。比如说“十”加“口”可以变成“古”，也可以变成“叶”。这样的组合构成了我们汉字的写法和组合。 </p><p>这个游戏就是让你在很多个偏旁中去组合汉字，最后全部去除掉，就可以得到胜利。游戏中你会发现，有时，你根本没法消除了，那是因为你的方案也许不是最好的。有的时侯，你还会发现，你组合出来的文字和答案的文字也不一样。那是因为汉字的变化太多。你组合出来的也许不是电脑生成出来的，你的选择也许更好一样。 </p><p>这个游戏难度非常高，可以说是“最难”的文字游戏，不信你就试试吧。 <br>把所有偏旁全部消除才能过关。完成小学难度才可以使用初中难度，一点点的升级到最高级难度。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=air.com.ctaigy2013.llld" Tapwriter  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Soft+Brew+Mobile" title="Soft Brew Mobile">Soft Brew Mobile</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.wilfredo.bigol.Tapwriter"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJgokEiIKHGNvbS53aWxmcmVkby5iaWdvbC5UYXB3cml0ZXIQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  The classic typing game with modern features and gameplay where single mistake could result into a catastrophe. <p>Test your skill with 4 different Game modes:<br>All game play modes are enhanced by a falling objects to fix keys, freeze time, add time, and multiply points. <br>These objects presents as an advantage and also a distraction. So be careful not to be carried away.</p><p>Game Modes:</p><p>• Classic:<br>Difficulty: ★<br>Type the words on the screen as fast as you can for a limited time of 90 seconds.<br>Words starts from 3 letter and progresses up to 8 letter words.<br>Keys will not detach upon error.</p><p>• Arcade:<br>Difficulty: ★★★<br>A 6 second time is limited for each word and resets upon correct typing.<br>Words starts from 3 letter and progresses up to 8 letter words.<br>Keys will detach upon error. A repair item can restore the keys.</p><p>• Names:<br>Difficulty: ★★★★<br>Instead of words you will need to type the names of some famous Personalities.<br>You will need to use the shift key and space bar.<br>A 10 second time is limited for each name and resets upon correct typing.<br>Keys will detach upon error. A repair item can restore the keys.</p><p>• Spelling (Bonus Game):<br>Difficulty: ★★★<br>This is a new concept using android voice. <br>The words will be spoken to you then type the correct spelling of the word.<br>An 8 second time is limited for each word and resets upon correct typing. <br>Time gradually decrease as score increases, minimum is 4sec.<br>There are no sentences or phrase to be spoken. These are common seven letter words.<br>Keys will detach upon error. A repair item can restore the keys.</p><p><br>All game modes have Practice modes so you can hone your skills before playing.</p><p>Note: Due to the style of game-play physical keyboards are not supported. This game is best played on a screen greater than or equal to 3.5 in.</p><p>Powered by Andengine.</p><p>Tags: typing games, typing, typewriter, HD game, It's a challenge.<br>* Numbers: Find sequences of numbers<br>* Gems search: Find the gems and diamonds in the same bunch.</p><p>★ Customization ★<br>You can customize many features of the game (in the settings option):<br>* You can change the name of the player or its image (avatar). ✮史上最有趣最益智的填字游戏大全。<br>✮玩填字游戏不但打发了时间,增长了知识,还具有减轻压力和增长智力的作用。<br>✮英国《每日邮报》：“长期有规律的做填字游戏可以使人的大脑效率提高14倍”。<p>✮点击字母按键输入首字母拼音，正确完成词条就会自动转换为汉字显示。 <br>✮当前编辑词为蓝色方格表示，下部红色描述是当前词的问题。<br>✮当完成一道题目后，可以连接到百度百科中进一步了解该词的详细介绍。</p><p>[玩法]<br>*点击字母按键输入首字母拼音，正确完成词条就会自动转换为汉字显示。 <br> 如: 1.”世界七大奇迹中在我国的是?” 答案为: “长城” 那么输入”CC”就行,会自动显示为汉字长城的哦。<br>    2.如果答案中有数字,如”123″,那么输入读音的首字母，输入”YRS”,会自动显示为数字”123″。<br>    3.对于外国人名或地方名，如 “阿道夫·希特勒”忽略中间标点符号，只输入”阿道夫希特勒“,即”ADFXTL”。</p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" The protagonists are typically a team of five (in some cases fewer) people who gain superpowers (magical or technological), wear color-coded uniforms, and use advanced weapons and martial arts skills to battle an antagonist group of evil beings threatening to take over the Earth. In most of the episodes, the team confronts and defeats an army of enemy soldiers and the "monster of the week" to thwart the antagonists plans, and in one last effort to defeat the heroes, an enlarged version of the monster appears to confront them, just to be defeated again when they call for huge robotic vehicles/animals ("mecha") that can combine to form one or more giant robots to fight it. Sentai Series with the giant robot element are specifically known as Super Sentai. levels.<br> - Normal, Medium, Hard &amp; Expert difficulty modes.<br> - Challenge your skills in 4 difficulty modes in several packs.<br> - Compete with thousands of players around the world.<br> - Tap over the words to find their meaning from online dictionary.	<br> - Languages : English, Spanish, French, German, Italian &amp; Portuguese.<br> <br>---------------------------<br>*** Game Play ***</p><p> - Tap over blanks in the board and fill the missing letters to form words shown above it.<br> - Find all the words in the list to complete the level.<br> - Faster you find words higher the score &amp; ranking.</p><p>---------------------------<br>*** Other Features ***</p><p> - Awesome graphics with fluid animations.<br> - Choose your board size to match your skill.<br> - All packs have Game"> 126.    Word Drop : Word Puzzle Game  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=bindas" title="bindas">bindas</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.kjsoft.wordpanic2"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHwodEhsKFWNvbS5ranNvZnQud29yZHBhbmljMhABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Word Drop is a new type of Word Puzzle Game where your objective is to find words from falling letters. Find words to solve word puzzles with unique and challenging twists.<p>Extremely addictive, totally Free, no in-apps! Just play and enjoy!</p><p>How to play:<br>-You just have drag your finger over and combine letters in the word pad to guess the word.<br>- You can see your guess in preview too.<br>- if you find correct answer than it will remove those letters.</p><p>It combines some elements of Scrabble and Boggle. Valid words boost your score and the dwindling timer; used letters disappear and new ones drop from above.</p><p>If you use four letters or more the score will be very high compared to three letters. Keep making words to increase your score.  The challenge increases the longer you last.</p><p>This game is pretty much like the popular word games but with a little aspect of gravity in it.</p><p>Unlike other word games which allows you to take your own sweet time searching for the right word, this Falling Word Search game requires you to be fast when forming words.</p><p>As letters boxes fall and fill up the screen, if any of the letters fall out of the screen, you'll lose the game.</p><p>An addicting and fun word game which will surely take up hours of your time as it challenges not just your vocabulary skills but also your finger + eye coordination.</p><p><br>Keep your mind healthy, test your word vocabulary and exercise your brain once a day.</p><p>GAME MODES:</p><p>1. Panic Mode: create as many words as possible before the letters fill up the screen</p><p>2. Puzzle Mode: Every word you make adds five extra letters. If the letters reach above the blue swirling bar its game over</p><p>3. Time Mode: You got 3 minutes to create as many words as possible.</p><p>4. Panic Extreme: Hard Version of Panic Mode.	</p><p>5. Đừng lo, hãy tham gia ngay game Đuổi hình bắt chữ - Xuân Bắc – game đuổi hình bắt chữ duy nhất trên smartphone mang lại cho bạn cảm giác như đang được chơi đuổi hình bắt chữ cùng Mc Xuân Bắc trên truyền hình.<br>Game đuổi hình bắt chữ mới có sự góp mặt của Mc Xuân Bắc tham gia trò chơi cùng bạn, Mc sẽ là người giúp đỡ, hướng dẫn trò chơi và là người đồng hành cùng bạn trong suốt trò chơi.<br>Cách chơi thú vị , dễ chơi , dễ nghiện. Các câu đố được biên tập cẩn thận có độ thử thách cao, nhiều câu hỏi sẽ thực sự thách thức giới hạn trí tuệ của bạn , tạo được sự hứng thú mỗi khi giải được câu hỏi.<br> Đặc biệt, các câu hỏi được đưa ra dưới dạng hình động, hoạt hình giống hoàn toàn với những câu hỏi ở trên gameshow của đài truyền hình, không như những game khác trên thị trường, hình ảnh câu hỏi chỉ là hình tĩnh và có sự lặp lại trong đáp án.<br>Hình ảnh và âm thanh vui nhộn, có nguồn từ chính đài truyền hình và Mc, hẳn các bạn sẽ thấy vừa thân quen vừa thú vị, cũng không kém phần thử thách. <br>Ngoài những sự giúp đỡ từ Mc trong trò chơi, bạn còn có thể nhận được sự giúp đỡ từ bạn bè thông qua mạng xã hội, cũng như biết được vị trí của mình trên bảng xếp hạng.<p>Các tính năng nổi bật :<br>-	Game đuổi hình bắt chữ duy từ Mc và bạn bè thông qua mạng xã hội.<br>-	Hơn 20,000 câu hỏi , sinh động, liên tục cập nhật.<br>-	Tích hợp chia sẻ kết quả , giúp đỡ thông qua facebook và các mạng xã hội<br>-	Hình ảnh, âm thanh One of the world's best word games has arrived on Android. Reminiscent of Boggle, Go, and Scrabble, Letterplex is a two-player turn-based game that blends word-search skills with strategy. Crossword puzzle lovers will enjoy this game too.  This is a game that you'll pick up and not be able to put down.</p><p>SIMPLY A GREAT GAME<br>The mechanics are simple: you play words from a grid of letters. Anagramming, word search...these skills are table stakes. Then comes the fun. Your opponent steals letters from you. You steal back. You build your defenses. Your opponent hunkers down as well. In a matter of minutes, this simple game transforms into an epic contest!</p><p>AUTO-MATCH, PLAY FRIENDS OR PASS &amp; PLAY!<br>Play against opponents from all over the world simply by tapping Play Now, or challenge your friends and family members by tapping Choose Opponent. You can invite anyone with an Android phone or tablet to play with you. You can even play yourself or the person next to you with the new Pass &amp; Play option!</p><p>FREE<br>Letterplex is free! The full, complete game can be played, with an unlimited number of Pass and Play games (as well as up to two concurrent online games), for free. Optional in-game purchases allow you to review the lists of played words for every game and to play simultaneous games online against more than two opponents.</p><p>Download Letterplex now, and step class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=iThinkdiff" title="iThinkdiff">iThinkdiff</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="net.ithinkdiff.wordsearch31"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJQojEiEKG25ldC5pdGhpbmtkaWZmLndvcmRzZWFyY2gzMRABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  透過在適於各個年齡的單玩家智力遊戲中搜尋單詞，盡享遊戲之樂，構建31種不同語言中任何一種語言的詞彙。<p>主要特點<br>--------------------------------------------- <br>• 31種不同語言<br>• 16個英語分類<br>• 隨機生成智力遊戲<br>• 當日單詞<br>• 快閃記憶卡<br>• 用書簽標記的單詞可存取詞典（僅英語）<br>• 英語單詞的發音<br>• 排行榜和成就<br>• 炫酷安心音樂</p><p><br>支援的語言<br>--------------------------------------------- <br>單詞搜尋構建詞彙量遊戲是提高母語和第二語言詞彙量的奇妙方式。在所有下列語言中支援單詞搜尋：</p><p>*英語 <br>*阿拉伯語 <br>*西班牙 <br>*法國 <br>*土耳其 <br>*泰國 <br>*菲律賓 <br>*德國 <br>*葡萄牙文 <br>*意大利 <br>*俄羅斯 <br>*希臘 <br>*印尼 <br>*馬來 <br>*越南 <br>*韓國 <br>*日本 <br>*中國 <br>*荷蘭 <br>*挪威 <br>*芬蘭 <br>*羅馬尼亞 <br>*波蘭 <br>*烏克蘭 <br>*波斯 <br>*印地文 <br>*孟加拉語 <br>*烏爾都語 <br>*泰米爾 <br>*古吉拉特語 <br>*馬拉</p><p>英語詞彙量變化<br>--------------------------------------------- <br>透過趣味方式按下列分類增加英語詞彙量。</p><p>•初學者 <br>•高級 <br>•通用 <br>•標準 <br>•動物 <br>•顏色 <br>•地理 <br>•食物 <br>•正 <br>•國家稅務總局 <br>•托福 <br>•雅思 <br>•科學 <br>•數學 <br>•業務 <br>•醫療</p><p>玩遊戲<br>--------------------------------------------- <br>兒童和成年人都會喜歡玩單詞搜尋構建詞彙量遊戲。該遊戲自動生成個人偏好的語言智力遊戲，因此，你所需要做的就是發現單詞時用手指滑動整個單詞。</p><p>若未發現所有單詞，請觸按提示按鈕。但是請明智地使用提示（每個智力遊戲僅有兩個提示）。當你發現該智力遊戲中的每個單詞時，該遊戲自動結束和更新個人統計。</p><p>遊戲後可以給首次遇到的單詞加書簽或在內置英語字典中查詢並聽單詞發音。你還可以在遊戲內給自己傳送郵件，郵寄加書簽的單詞，因此你可以將其新增到桌面學習工具。</p><p>隨著個人統計量增加，可以在所用各種語言的遊戲中心排行榜上尋找你的名字—查看你是否可以成為單詞搜尋世界冠軍！</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <div class="cover-image-container"> <div class="cover-outer-align"> <div class="cover-inner-align"> <img alt="GoGetGame 詞語拼拼拼" class="cover-image" data-cover-large="https://lh4.ggpht.com/7aRZyQsdujjkD4vcyJdwYoqMzqyidmpUHGUOhXQ_RijhX01jtIw1ZWzPGKD1zfvk8Xc=w340-rw" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.gogetgame.gamehapp" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.gogetgame.gamehapp" title="GoGetGame 詞語拼拼拼"> 140.    GoGetGame 詞語拼拼拼  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=ColboNet+Limited" title="ColboNet Limited">ColboNet Limited</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.gogetgame.gamehapp"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIAoeEhwKFmNvbS5nb2dldGdhbWUuZ2FtZWhhcHAQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  GoGetGame《詞語拼拼拼》是一個多語言拼詞遊戲。參加者用英或中文（繁／簡）單字或百搭拼片在遊戲板上橫、直、斜組成相連詞語，寓學習於遊戲、啟發語文靈活運用。遊戲每局１至４人參予，可由單人、電腦對決，或讓朋友們互相切磋！<p>遊戲規則<br>- 第一組詞語在遊戲板中央星號方格開始。<br>- 用拼片架上的拼片組成成語或常用詞語，橫、直、或斜放在遊戲板上。<br>- 新拼的詞語必須連接到遊戲板上現有的詞語。<br>- 當放上拼片達１００塊，遊戲便結束。</p><p>操作指示<br>- 除了單字拼片外，還可用空白百搭拼片，輸入所需的字符。<br>- 按右鍵到下一步，選定新組成的詞語（最多兩組）。<br>- 按右鍵提交詞組。<br>- 完成回合後，視乎所使出單字拼片分數，百搭拼片可獲補充１至４塊（最多可儲存６塊）。</p><p>計分方法<br>- 每塊拼片的分數標誌在右下角，從２到９分。難字分數較高；而使用百搭拼片亦有１分。<br>- 遊戲板上有數字圓圈的是獎賞方格，放上的字（圓環）或詞（實心圓）可獲兩倍或三倍的分數。<br>- 但若回合中只用百塔拼片，獎賞方格則無效，連接到的現有拼片每塊亦只當作１分計算。<br>- 如在一回合用到至少兩塊單字拼片，另加特別獎賞３０分（遊戲頭一組詞除外，特別獎賞為１５分）。</p><p>與我們保持聯繫：<br>https://www.facebook.com/gogetgame<br>https://twitter.com/GoGetGame</p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.gogetgame.gamehapp" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> </div>     <div class="reason-set">  <span class="stars-container"> <a 2不同，但非常有趣的經歷！</p><p>此外，這個遊戲已經內置多國語言字典。</p><p>洗牌的特點：<br> - 有幾種語言<br> - 幾個難度等級（簡單，中，硬）<br> - Scramble and twist your brain to make words from jumbled lines of letters. Simply rearrange the scrambled letters into words, and underline them with your finger to score points; find and underline the largest word and you advance to the next level. <p>Play in a relaxing un-timed mode, or put your skills up against the clock in timed rounds. </p><p>Jumbline 2 includes two additional games: Cloud Pop and Star Tower. In Cloud Pop, your goal is to pop as many clouds as possible, by spelling words out of the letters carried in each cloud. In Star Tower, your task is to build the tallest tower you can, before it sinks into the ground, by making and staking words out of an infinitely jumbled line of letters. The larger the word, the slower your tower sinks, so scramble and twist your brain to think big!</p><p>Jumbline 2 supports Phones, Tablets, touch screens, physical keyboards, and beautifully adjusts to fit any device size and screen orientation thrown into the mix.</p><p>Jumbline 2 is ideal for fans of Scrabble, Words With Friends, TextTwist, TextTwist Turbo, and Text Twist 2. Permainan yang bisa disebut tebak gambar ini terdiri dari beberapa pertanyaan yang ada di sekitar kita. Terdiri dari ratusan pertanyaan dari yang paling mudah hingga ke level yang sulit.<p>Pertanyaan yang ditawarkan di tebak kata bergambar ini pun juga sangat kreatif dan unik dalam menguji daya ingat kosakata benda di memori otak kita, anda diwajibkan menemukan jawaban-jawaban dari setiap petunjuk yang disajikan. Selain berisi tentang benda di sekitar kita seperti alat rumah tangga, buah, hewan, profesi bahkan persamaan kata pun wajib anda kuasai. Kuis tebak kata ini juga menggunakan perumpamaan tebak siapakah aku yang jelas dan akan mengundang kita untuk memposisikan diri kita di pertanyaan yang di maksud.</p><p>Level yang ditawarkan juga semakin sulit seiring bertambahnya level yang ditawarkan. Saat anda bisa menjawab satu tebakan maka akan menimbulkan rasa penasaran untuk tebakan berikutnya. Semakin naik level akan semakin ketagihan untuk bisa segera menyelesaikan game ini.</p><p>Fitur yang tersedia di dalam kuis tebak kata:<br>- Gratis<br>- Gambar Background Beragam Agar Tidak Bosan<br>- Fitur Post Pertanyaan Ke Facebook Agar Dibantu Teman<br>- Fitur Reset Game.<br>- Selalu Update<br>- Game Yang Ringan Untuk Dimainkan</p><p>Download Sekarang Juga dan mainkan. 樂加  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=logos+quiz+games" title="logos quiz games">logos quiz 猜數以百計的樂趣不同的品牌標識的名稱！標誌測驗趣味此外，它是免費的，Top應用2012年。<p>在我們的生活，我們遇到這麼多的標誌，在所有領域，但你能記得多少，並承認嗎？試試這個標誌有獎問答遊戲，你會測試你的大腦和你的記憶。有數百個標誌，它們都是世界各地的普遍認可的知名品牌，其中一些製造汽車，服裝，食品，飲料，其他高新技術企業或服務提供商。</p><p>與標誌的樂趣測驗這個有趣的遊戲。</p><p>所有標識有3難度級別，1級有1點，2級有3點，3級有5點，只要你能贏得更多！並與你的朋友你的分數，這將是更多挑戰和更多的樂趣:-)）</p><p>請注意：在這場比賽中顯示或代表所有標誌保護版權和/或各自公司的商標。此應用程序，而不是與它相關的人，聲稱任何在這個程序中使用任何標識的所有權（版權或其他方式）。受版權和/或商標保護的標誌。在此應用程序的使用低分辨率的標誌圖像鑑定資格根據美國版權法“合理使用”。</p><p>歡迎任何反饋！請發送到coobiapp@yahoo.com~~V</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> Бесплатно годовая коллекция. Спасибо, что дождались!<p>Новый номер журнала выходит каждую пятницу в 12-00 по Москве. Можно cкачать целиком все журналы к себе на телефон, планшет, а затем в любое время разгадывать без Интернета, 3G, WiFi. </p><p>Идея журнала - легкость. Поэтому никаких таймеров, рейтингов, конкурсов, дуэлей, команд – всё это честно и красиво реализовано на www.scanword.ru. Доступны подсказки.</p><p>Разгадывание сканвордов бесплатное, все архивы бесплатные. Встроенные покупки две: 1) дополнительные подсказки, 2) отключение рекламы навсегда.  Отключение рекламы - наши "чаевые" один раз в жизни на ваше усмотрение. Дополнительные подсказки - с двойным бонусом на каждой ступени: 32 = два по 8, 128 = два по 32, 512 = два по 128.</p><p>Поддержка, обсуждение, встреча, знакомство: Word Search 2015  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Littlebigplay" title="Littlebigplay">Littlebigplay</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="air.com.littlebigplay.games.wordsearch2015"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaNAoyEjAKKmFpci5jb20ubGl0dGxlYmlncGxheS5nYW1lcy53b3Jkc2VhcmNoMjAxNRABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  03/2015: Added a new word search mode called RELAX! You don't have any limit in this new game mode but you can still submit your score (total games played). Each time you complete the RELAX mode the number of solved games is increased. And what more? You can play the RELAX mode even offline :). Enjoy!<p>Word Search 2015 is a new word search highscores game with more than 800 categories of various genres and 2 game modes! All the categories are high scores based, so don't forget to submit your score at the end of the game, you are playing against people all around the world! You can submit score for every single category or overall score for all categories! Do you think you can make it into TOP20 highscores?</p><p>How to play: The rules are simple - there will be shown a sequence of words (word by word) -  find them all as fast as possible! You score depends on your speed!</p><p>How to select a word: Put your finger on a letter and move it to the adjacent letters horizontally, vertically or diagonally to select the word. Find the word that is shown above the board!</p><p>How to change background color: Tap on the square in the top right corner!</p><p>Features:</p><p>* 2 game modes - online and relax offline<br>* Over 800 word categories + new categories added every few days!<br>* Learn new vocabularies and improve your English dictionary<br>* Global leaderboards included - compare your score with other people all around the world<br>* Local leaderboards included - stores your best results for each category<br>* Review results of other people - tap on the trophy icon on "Select a category" screen<br>* Each game is different<br>* Change the background color<br>* Great fun for the whole family<br>* Your progress is saved<br>* 100% free full version with no In-App purchases</p><p>Have a nice time playing Word Search 2015 and if you like the game and want to support it so please leave a review and rate the game. Boom Pinoy  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Pinoy+Info+Tech" title="Pinoy Info Tech">Pinoy Info Tech</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.kudos.boompinoy"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHQobEhkKE2NvbS5rdWRvcy5ib29tcGlub3kQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  From the creator of Pinoy Palayok, another game that showcases the traditional games of Filipinos like Sipa, Palo Sebo and Pukpok Palayok. Boom Pinoy is a riddle game wherein the player must answer the riddle before time runs out. Hint helps the player to guess the answer in the riddle but in order to use the hint, the player must hit the palayok, sipa or collect flags according to the mode of the game. <p>There are three modes in the game; the first mode is the Pukpok Palayok, followed by Palo Sebo and lastly Sipa. While thinking the answer in the riddle given, you can spend your time by hitting the palayok, sipa, or collecting flags to make the hint available. The latest version of Boom Pinoy has the option to change the language either Filipino or English in answering the riddle.</p><p>This is the game I offer to every Filipinos who miss playing these kind of childhood games. Once again I am very proud that I was able to use the technology nowadays to share the beauty of our traditions.</p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.merigotech.fillwords" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.merigotech.fillwords" title="Филворды: поиск слов"> 222.    Филворды: поиск слов  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=MerigoTech" title="MerigoTech">MerigoTech</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.merigotech.fillwords"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIgogEh4KGGNvbS5tZXJpZ290ZWNoLmZpbGx3b3JkcxABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Игра Филворды: поиск слов - это несколько сотен уровней интеллектуального наслаждения. Вы ищете загаданные слова, а симпатичные монстры помогают вам. Сможете ли вы дойти до конца игры, заполнив все квадраты словами, а сосуды наполнить разноцветной жидкостью? <p>« Вне всяких похвал! Красиво, стильно, и давно искал подобную игру »<br>« Отличная игра, нравится, играем всей семьёй. »<br>« Интересно! Классная игрушка, куча уровней и симпатичное оформление »</p><p>Более 500 уровней подготовлены специально для вас. В начале разгадывание головоломки может показаться несложным занятием. Но, по мере того, как количество букв увеличивается, угадывать слова становится сложнее и еще увлекательнее. Забавные монстры подскажут вам буквы из слова, вам останется угадать его.</p><p>ПРАВИЛА ИГРЫ</p><p>На квадратном поле расположены буквы. Найдите все слова, выделяя буквы, стоящие рядом, так, чтобы слова целиком заполняли квадрат. Не все, а только загаданные слова подходят для заполнения. <br>Если вы растерялись и не видите слов, то цветные монстрики подскажут вам, с чего начать. С каждым уровнем сложность игры возрастает, а угадывать слова всё интереснее.</p><p>Игра предназначена для тех, кто любит разгадывать кроссворды, играть в виселицу, заниматься поиском слов, составлять слова из букв или просто угадывать их. Основная идея взята из игры типа "венгерский кроссворд", но улучшена и адаптирована для мобильных устройств.</p><p>ОТЗЫВЫ</p><p>« Очень интересная игра, с каждым уровнем сложнее становиться и от этого увлекательнее играть:) »</p><p>« Просто супер , с подругами сидели разгадывали , очень понравилось)) побольше бы таких приложений, для ума полезно!)) »</p><p>« Отлично! Замечательная развивающая, обогощающая словарный запас игрушка! Невозможно оторваться! Спасибо разрабам! » </p><p>Филворды в социальных сетях:</p><p>ВКонтакте: http://vk.com/fillword<br>Фейсбук: <div class="description">  詞搜索拼圖<p><br>尋找隱藏在謎題的話。詞交織水平，垂直或斜在任何方面，無論是從右到左，從左到右，和自頂向下和自底向上。</p><p>鼓勵你的孩子去尋找的話，請選擇較小尺寸的謎題他們。</p><p>這是可以在市場上最好的搜索詞之一：</p><p>A）這個詞的搜索數不勝數：</p><p>它們會自動被生成的AI根據設置，您可以在遊戲的偏好菜單中找到生成的。</p><p><br>B）播放：</p><p>為了紀念這個詞，滑動你的手指，這個詞出現在磁帶同樣的意義。當你已經完全覆蓋，抬起你的手指取出磁帶並繼續播放。</p><p>當你退出遊戲的遊戲會自動保存。當您返回時，你可以繼續你離開的地方，所以只要你喜歡解決難題，你可以盡可能多的時間。您也可以啟動一個新的難題沒有完成前一個。</p><p>在比賽結束後，實際花費的時間你要解決它，並提出在該類別中的最佳時間將會顯示。</p><p><br>C）下面是設置：</p><p>難度：<br>- ！這個測驗類型遊戲測試你猜測的力量和你的詞彙量。你就會被迫使用你的想像力各地數以百計的圖像的每一刻。別擔心，沒有成人的內容，所以它是一個完美的腦筋急轉彎為大家 ！溫習你的行話，因為圖片不會總是最難的部分。文豪，來和顯示你的交叉技能吧 ！有足夠的圖片，在這裡，讓你打，天 ！圖形和遊戲都是鋒利的和我們保證無數個小時，無所事事，但有趣的 ！在跳動的水準與風格的同時賺取積分 （虛擬硬幣） - 你能解開他們？ - <br>你能猜出所有文字和解鎖各級嗎？無數容易棘手的難題等著你！</p><p> - 挖這個詞從美麗的圖畫 - <br>這個詞是什麼？在四畫面看，發現他們有什麼共同的。贏了！</p><p>所以，這就是它 - class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.havos.codewordunlimited" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.havos.codewordunlimited" title="码字游戏"> 251.    码字游戏  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Havos+Ltd" title="Havos Ltd">Havos Ltd</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.havos.codewordunlimited"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJQojEiEKG2NvbS5oYXZvcy5jb2Rld29yZHVubGltaXRlZBABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  你学英语吗？或者，也许法文，俄文或其他外语吗？你可以玩这个游戏，游戏将帮助你在你的语言学习。这是好玩的，和你学习的同时。游戏中有一个模式为语言学习者。这种模式只使用最流行的词汇。本场比赛是寻找隐藏的话。你会发现他们后，您可以查看您自己的语言中的单词的定义！您可以将游戏设置为更困难，因为你提高你的词汇量的大小。<p>码字游戏是相当正常的填字游戏类似​​，但使用的数字，而不是正常的问题。在每个框中写了一些。球员必须发现其中的字母对应的每个号码。这种方式，你找到的字，它背后隐藏的数字.</p><p>如果玩家是在难度，应用程序提供了两个非常有用的辅助工具。 （1）游戏中可以提供另一个解码一封信。 （2）本场比赛可以告诉你可能的答案未完成单词。游戏中使用的字母，您已经解码并显示匹配的单词。</p><p>选择语言的词语列表，从大范围的下载词典。目前，24种语言（见下文）。</p><p>词典是英语，西班牙语，葡萄牙语，俄语，阿拉伯语，法语，德语，意大利语，印尼语，保加利亚语，克罗地亚语，捷克语，丹麦语，希腊语，匈牙利语，波兰语，罗马尼亚语，塞尔维亚语（拉丁），塞尔维亚（西里尔文），斯洛伐克，斯洛文尼亚，瑞典，土耳其，乌克兰和以后.</p><p>English Version:<br>Are you learning English? Or maybe French, Russian or another foreign language? You can play this game; and the game will help you in your language learning. It is fun to play; and you learn at the same time. The game has a mode for language learners. This mode uses only the most popular words. The game is about finding hidden words. After you find them, you can view the definition of the word in your own language! You can set the game to be more difficult as you improve the size of your vocabulary.</p><p>Codewords are quite similar to normal crosswords; but use numbers instead of normal questions. In each box is written a number. The player must discover which letter corresponds to each number. This way you find the word that is hidden behind the numbers.</p><p>If the player is in difficulty, the application provides two very useful aids. (1) The game can provide another decoded letter. (2) The game can show you potential answers for an uncompleted word. The game uses the letters that you have already decoded and displays the matching words.</p><p>Choose the language of the word list, from a large range of downloadable dictionaries.  26 languages are currently available (see below).</p><p>Dictionaries available are English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian, Arabic, Bulgarian, Croatian, Czech, Danish, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Polish, Norwegian, Romanian, Serbian(Latin), Serbian(Cyrillic), Slovak, Slovene, Swedish, Turkish, Ukrainian and more coming later.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.havos.codewordunlimited" WordBrain  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=MAG+Interactive" title="MAG Interactive">MAG Interactive</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="se.maginteractive.wordbrain"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJQojEiEKG3NlLm1hZ2ludGVyYWN0aXZlLndvcmRicmFpbhABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  It starts very easy but gets challenging quickly. Deze woorden kunnen zowel van links naar rechts als van rechts naar links geschreven zijn, alsmede zowel horizontaal als verticaal als diagonaal. Dezelfde letters kunnen meerdere keren gebruikt worden.</p><p>Woordzoekers staan net als kruiswoordpuzzels vaak in kranten en tijdschriften. In 60 seconds, you need to come up with maximum 3 words, which gives you as many points as possible. It is up to you what strategy you choose to win a battle. PowerWord - Improve your Vocab  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Mt.+Ford+Studios" title="Mt. Ford Studios">Mt. Ford Studios</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="au.com.mountfordstudios.powerword"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKwopEicKIWF1LmNvbS5tb3VudGZvcmRzdHVkaW9zLnBvd2Vyd29yZBABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  PowerWord is an original word game where the goal is to read a hint and then rearrange the tiles to spell out a word. This is a great way to improve your spelling and vocabulary, or to learn new vocabulary. If English is your second language, no worries! You can start on Easy and work your way up to Extreme! You can also add new words that you wish to learn to the inbuilt dictionary, or delete words you no longer need. Customise your PowerWord word list however you wish!<p>The game includes:<br>• Over 2600 built-in words and hints!<br>• Seven difficulty levels - Easy (4 to 5 letter words), Medium (6 to 7 letter words), Hard (8 to 9 letter words), Very Hard (10 to 11 letter words), Extreme (12 to 13 letter words), Formidable (14 to 15 letter words), and ALL (all difficulty levels played at once).<br>• Add words and hints to the dictionary. If you see a new word that you don't know the meaning of, just add it to PowerWord!<br>• Edit existing hints if you want something more cryptic.<br>• Delete words that you no longer need.<br>• The dictionary keeps track of how many times you have attempted a word, and how often you were correct.<br>• You can restore the original dictionary anytime through the Settings menu. This keeps all your custom vocab.<br>• Sounds can be turned on or off at any time</p><p>If you like learning while you have fun, and keeping your brain active, give PowerWord a go!</p><p>PowerWord is a free word game because it is advertisement-supported. WordHunt  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Punomys" title="Punomys">Punomys</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.pns.wordhunt"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaGgoYEhYKEGNvbS5wbnMud29yZGh1bnQQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Word hunt is a challenging word search puzzle game where you try to find as many words as possible by stringing letters together on a 4x4 field. Choose one of the supported languages - English, Dutch, French and Spanish - and play against time or a friend with multiplayer mode!<p>Features:</p><p>- Three languages to choose from: English, Dutch, French and Spanish</p><p>- Extensive word lists: the word list for each language is based on the official Scrabble word list</p><p>- Two time modes. In timed mode you have one minute to find as many words as possible. Choose the more leisurely  infinite mode and try to find all hidden words!</p><p>- Highscore for each language</p><p>- Multiplayer support: play with a friend or start a match against a random player</p><p>- Solution screen: when the game is over, you can check the solution to see all the possible words for that round</p><p>- Unique game generation algorithm: each time you play, a new field is generated that is guaranteed to contain at least 100 words!</p><p>The gameplay for the word search is easy: just connect the letters horizontally, vertically or diagonally by swiping over them. When you lift your finger, the formed word will be searched in the dictionary to see if it exists.<br>You get more points by making longer words and by using letters with a high value.</p><p>More 4 Words Game  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Pentawire" title="Pentawire">Pentawire</a>   <span data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  4 Words Game is a funny guess the word (or 4 pics 1 word) style game.<br>The goal of this words quiz game is to arrange the letters to find a mysterious word.<br>To guess the mysterious word you have up to 4 words related with the hidden word (instead of 4 pics).<br>This app tests your knowledge at solving words puzzles, if you get stuck on a level you can try to use an hint.<p>There are some different kinds hints you can use to pass a level:</p><p>- Add a related word (up to 4 words);<br>- Add a correct initial letter (up to 3 letters);<br>- Delete an incorrect letter (up to 3 letters);<br>- Show the length of the hidden word.</p><p>To use an hint you need some coins, but do not run out of coins if you want to solve all the levels.<br>You earn coins every time you solve a level.<br>In the game there are a lot of levels across the Italian words and English words scenes so, with this app you can also learn new languages.<br>At starting levels some hints are already displayed but when you advance in the game hints are gradually hidden.<br>The app also have world leaderboards and additional achievements to make the gameplay more interesting.</p><p>You have only 1 word to guess, test your skill and Have fun!</p><p>Game class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Military+Quiz+Games" title="Military Quiz Games">Military Quiz Games</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.mqg.namethatfalklandswarthing"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKwopEicKIWNvbS5tcWcubmFtZXRoYXRmYWxrbGFuZHN3YXJ0aGluZxABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  基於圖像的瑣事問答遊戲和 1982 年的福克蘭群島戰爭的指南。包括人、 武器、 船隻、 潛艇、 飛機、 直升機、 導彈、 更多的軍事硬體。<p>福克蘭群島戰爭，也被稱為福克蘭群島衝突，福克蘭群島危機和格拉德爾大西洋 Sur (西班牙文為"南大西洋戰爭"），在阿根廷與聯合王國之間的十個星期戰爭在南大西洋的兩個英國海外領土： 福克蘭群島、 南喬治亞島和南桑威奇群島。它開始于星期五 1982 年 4 月 2 日當阿根廷入侵和佔領福克蘭群島，企圖建立它一直堅稱他們的主權。4 月 5 日英國政府派遣了海軍的特遣部隊，在島上的一次兩栖攻擊之前進行的阿根廷海軍和空軍。衝突持續了 74 天，1982 年 6 月 14 日，該群島回到英國控制阿根廷投降而告終。</p><p>英國特遣部隊最終組成 127 船： 43 皇家海軍船隻、 22 皇家海軍輔助艦隊的艦艇和 62 艘商船。福克蘭群島在奪回被認為極其困難： 主要的限制就是，部署空中掩護上的差距。英國人不得不共有 42 架飛機 （28 海鷂和 14 鷂 GR.3s） 可用的空中作戰行動，反對大約 122 個可用的噴氣式戰鬥機。</p><p>功能：<br>可檢索的照片庫<br>對於大多數專案的資訊連結<br>難度級別<br>將高解析度的圖像保存到圖片庫<br>通過電子郵件或文本共用圖片<br>審查以前的遊戲，要從錯誤中學習<br>可變的遊戲長度</p><p>篩檢程式包括：<br>英國<br>阿根廷<br>飛機<br>船</p><p>請注意是否您的語言設置為英語 （-&gt; 語言設置功能表） 應用程式中，更多的圖片將可用。並不是所有的測驗專案已譯成所有語文。</p><p></p><p>English:</p><p>falklands war trivia quiz game</p><p>Test and improve your knowledge of the Falklands War.</p><p>An image based trivia quiz game and guide for the 1982 Falklands War.  Includes people, weapons, ships, submarines, airplanes, helicopters, missiles and more military hardware.</p><p>The Falklands War, also known as the Falklands Conflict, Falklands Crisis, and the Guerra del Atlántico Sur (Spanish for "South Atlantic War"), was a ten-week war between Argentina and the United Kingdom over two British overseas territories in the South Atlantic: the Falkland Islands and South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands. It began on Friday 2 April 1982 when Argentina invaded and occupied the Falkland Islands in an attempt to establish the sovereignty it had long claimed over them. On 5 April, the British government dispatched a naval task force to engage the Argentine Navy and Air Force before making an amphibious assault on the islands. The conflict lasted 74 days and ended with the Argentine surrender on 14 June 1982, returning the islands to British control.</p><p>The British task force eventually comprised 127 ships: 43 Royal Navy vessels, 22 Royal Fleet Auxiliary ships and 62 merchant ships.  The retaking of the Falkland Islands was considered extremely difficult: the main constraint being the disparity in deployable air cover. The British had a total of 42 aircraft (28 Sea Harriers and 14 Harrier GR. es) available for air combat operations, against approximately 122 serviceable jet fighters.</p><p>features: <br> searchable photo gallery<br> informational links for most items<br> difficulty levels<br> save high resolution images to your photo gallery<br> share pictures via email or text<br> review previous games to learn from your mistakes<br> variable game lengths</p><p>filters include: <br> British<br> Argentine<br> Aircraft<br> Ship</p><p>Note that if you set your language to English in the application (Menu-&gt; settings-&gt; Language), more images will be available.  Not all quiz items have translations into all languages.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a Wordisto is for everyone who wants to <br>improve their English. One level has 60 sections and there are a total of 10 levels. You have 15 <br>seconds to match each word.  Wordisto vocabulary game will become one of your favourite pastimes <br>during which you will compete for points with your family and friends.</p><p>Unlike other vocabulary games with Wordisto you won’t get bored of learning new words.  Thanks to <br>this fun game you’ll improve your vocabulary on a regular basis and with every passing day you’ll <br>upgrade your English level. Угадай слово, узнай факт!  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=CoolGamesForFun" title="CoolGamesForFun">CoolGamesForFun</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.coolgamesforfun.guesstheword"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKgooEiYKIGNvbS5jb29sZ2FtZXNmb3JmdW4uZ3Vlc3N0aGV3b3JkEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  В этой игре Вас ждёт более трех сотен интересных и познавательных фактов о необычных животных, странных растениях и удивительных явлениях.<p>К примеру, Вы знаете, что такое филематология? А мы уверены, что знаете.... А кого называют «Королем фруктов»? А какой единственный во всем мире попугай совершенно не умеет летать?</p><p>Эти и другие интересные факты не позволят Вам зря потратить свое время, а помогут узнать много нового и интересного в удобном месте: в метро, во время ожидания, в кругу семьи. </p><p>Правила игры просты: нужно угадать загаданное слово, в подсказку - картинка, закрытая ячейками. Несколько ячеек можно убрать и увидеть часть картинки.<br>Наша игра не имеет ограничений по возрасту: в неё играют как взрослые, так и дети. Ведь интересные факты можно узнавать и всей семьёй: подключить папу, маму, брата или сестру!</p><p>Помимо подсказки с интересными фактами (жмите на восклицательный знак), у Вас есть ещё подсказка - «убрать неправильные буквы» и подсказка «открыть букву». Ваша цель - открыть минимальное количество клеток и быстро угадать слово. </p><p>Вперед! Угаданные слова выделяются разными цветами для наглядности.<p>Игра Поиск слов на русском языке имеет 7 уровней сложности: от простейшего на несколько слов до сложнейшего с десятками слов. Все слова разбиты по темам и их тоже можно выбирать. В случае затруднений можно пользоваться подсказками.</p><p>Для того чтобы игра Поиск слова оставалась бесплатной в ней используется реклама.</p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a
