href="/store/apps/details?id=com.tombaky.countriescitiesmp" title="Państwa Miasta (Inteligencja)"> 311.    Państwa Miasta (Inteligencja)  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=tombaky.com" title="tombaky.com">tombaky.com</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.tombaky.countriescitiesmp"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJwolEiMKHWNvbS50b21iYWt5LmNvdW50cmllc2NpdGllc21wEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Gra Państwa Miasta, jest odpowiednikiem popularnej gry towarzyskiej o tej samej nazwie, w którą grali Wasi rodzice. W dwudziestym pierwszym wieku, grać można nie tylko z kolegami z ławki, teraz gra się online z kolegami z całego świata! <p>Sieciowa wersja gry oferuje te same możliwości i oparta jest na tych samych zasadach co gra w realu, tylko, że nie potrzeba kartki, ani długopisu! Daje również możliwość treningu, w celu lepszego przygotowania się do rozgrywki w sieci. Gra w wersji sieciowej (online) wymaga konta Google+.</p><p>Ci z Was, którzy grali w tę grę i znają jej zasady, nie potrzebują żadnych wyjaśnień, interfejs gry jest prosty i intuicyjny, tak jak sama gra. Tym którzy nie grali w to nigdy,  proponujemy zacząć od treningu. </p><p>Gra polega na wpisaniu - w odpowiednie okienka - nazw: państwa, miasta, rośliny, zwierzęcia, imienia męskiego i imienia żeńskiego, zaczynających się na wybraną losowo przez grę, literę alfabetu. Wydaje się Wam, że dwie minuty w trybie treningu to dużo? W trybie gry sieciowej obowiązują nieco inne zasady dotyczące czasu. Podobnie jak w realu, czas rozgrywki zależy od najlepszego gracza. Gdy pierwszy uczestnik gry zakończy wpisywanie, reszta ma tylko piętnaście sekund na dokończenie! </p><p>Inaczej też wygląda punktowanie. Jeśli nazwa, którą wybrał uczestnik jest unikalna, to znaczy jeśli nikt inny jej nie wpisał, otrzymuje się 10 punktów, jeśli co najmniej dwóch graczy wpisało to samo - tylko pięć. Dlatego opłaca się wymyślać rzadsze, mniej znane nazwy! </p><p>Istnieje również możliwość gry w dziewięciu innych, dodatkowych kategoriach: stolica, nazwa zawodu, kolor, pierwiastek chemiczny, samochód, rzeka, ubiór, wyspy i postacie mitologii antycznej.  Można wybrać opcję gry, losowo dobrane sześć z piętnastu kategorii lub kategorie podstawowe. Wprowadziliśmy również ranking i możliwość wysłania do niego wyniku gry z przeciwnikiem, co pozwoli użytkownikom porównać swe umiejętności z innymi graczami! Zwracamy uwagę, że przy wpisywaniu, należy używać polskich znaków. Prosimy również by pamiętać o uaktualnianiu wersji gry, by można było grać z innymi użytkownikami.</p><p><br>Zapraszamy do gry. W przygotowaniu liczne ulepszenia i nowe możliwości.</p><p><br>W przypadku problemów lub sugestii prosimy o kontakt: tombaky.com@gmail.com</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span href="/store/apps/details?id=com.belisupraptono.gameasahotak" title="Game Asah Otak"> 312.    Game Asah Otak  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Beli+Supraptono" title="Beli Supraptono">Beli Supraptono</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.belisupraptono.gameasahotak"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKQonEiUKH2NvbS5iZWxpc3VwcmFwdG9uby5nYW1lYXNhaG90YWsQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Game Asah Otak yang akan menguji kemampuan dan pengetahuan anda. Game yang menuntut anda menemukan jawaban dari kata petunjuk yang diberikan. Dalam game ini tugas anda adalah menemukan inti, hubungan atau pun persamaan dari kata petunjuk yang diberikan.<p>Cara Main:<br>Kami berikan 1 kata petunjuk di kotak pertama. Tugas anda menjawab dengan 1 kata petunjuk tersebut. Jika masih kesulitan, anda dapat membuka kata petunjuk dalam kotak ke 2 hingga ke 5.</p><p>FItur:<br>- Game Ringan<br>- Terdapat Bantuan di Setiap Level<br>- Fitur Post Pertanyaan Ke Facebook</p><p>tag: kuis tebak kata,kuis asah otak,cerdas cermat,asah otak permainan</p><p>Game menyenangkan yang akan membuat anda selalu penasaran.  Two Birds word game  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Raketspel" title="Raketspel">Raketspel</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="se.raketspel.twobirds"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHwodEhsKFXNlLnJha2V0c3BlbC50d29iaXJkcxABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Two Birds is the fun and strategic word game. Take your time, there is no stress in Two Birds.</p><p>There is a lot of strategy though - should you go for the longest word, scare the opponent's bird or try to pick as many gold tiles as possible? The game gets more strategic and exciting the fewer tiles there are left.</p><p>If you need even more excitement – join the League. You get nine matches each week on your way to the top division. Raketspel's League Center™ makes league play easy. </p><p>A game is about 6-7 turns per player and doesn't take more than 10 minutes to finish. Connect to Google and Facebook and challenge your friends and show who's the top bird.</p><p>Please note that the game is completely free to play. Jogo da Forca  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Smart+Funny+Apps" title="Smart Funny Apps">Smart Funny Apps</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.smartfunny.forca"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHgocEhoKFGNvbS5zbWFydGZ1bm55LmZvcmNhEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Teste o seu vocabulário instalando gratuitamente o Jogo da Forca. <p>O bom e velho Jogo da Forca é um clássico passatempo jogado inicialmente com um papel e uma caneta. Agora você poderá jogá-lo em seu celular e ainda desafiar seus amigos online.</p><p>O jogo pode ser jogado de duas modalidades diferentes!</p><p>Na modalidade clássica você receberá uma dica de palavra de acordo com a categoria escolhida e terá que adivinhar a palavra sem que o personagem seja enforcado. Você poderá jogar nos temas Palavras Diversas, Conhecimentos Gerais, Diversão, Países, Ciências, Geografia, História e Inglês.</p><p>No modo multiplayer você poderá iniciar batalhas com seus amigos ou adversários aleatórios em que você define uma palavra e dá uma dica para seu oponente descobrir. class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.justanothertry.slovaizslova" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.justanothertry.slovaizslova" title="Слова из Слова"> 321.    Слова из Слова  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Uladzimir+Serakou" title="Uladzimir Serakou">Uladzimir Serakou</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.justanothertry.slovaizslova"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKQonEiUKH2NvbS5qdXN0YW5vdGhlcnRyeS5zbG92YWl6c2xvdmEQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Слова из Слова - одна из лучших головоломок со словами для Android в замечательном бумажном стиле. Для прохождения вам доступны 96 уровней, также имеется мультиплеер, где вы можете помериться силами с друзьями или случайным противником.<br>Правила игры в слова просты и многим знакомы с детства. Вам дается некоторое слово, необходимо составить все возможные слова из имеющихся букв. За составленные слова вам начисляются подсказки, которыми вы можете воспользоваться чтобы угадать оставшиеся слова. Наличие мультиплеера позволяет посоревноваться с друзьями в умении составлять и угадывать слова, а так же весело провести время. Интерес к игре подогревает система наград и рейтингов.<br>Игра в слова поможет вам провести время с пользой для ума, узнать новые слова, развить скорость реакции. Если вы любите разгадывать кроссворды, ребусы, играть в “Балду” и другие головоломки, то эта игра вам определенно понравится.<p>Особенности игры Слова из Слова:<br>• игра в слова с друзьями online<br>• награды за угаданные слова<br>• рейтинги лидеров в составлении слов<br>• составь слова на 96 уровнях с нарастающей сложностью<br>• угадай слово воспользовавшись подсказками<br>• бумажный grid.</p><p>The objective of the word search puzzles is to find and mark all the words hidden inside the box. </p><p>The words may be placed horizontally, vertically, or diagonally. </p><p>The list of Rebus Puzzles  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=That's+So+Panda" title="That's So Panda">That's So Panda</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.thatssopanda.rebuspuzzles"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJwolEiMKHWNvbS50aGF0c3NvcGFuZGEucmVidXNwdXp6bGVzEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Can’t live without word games? Then you need Rebus Puzzles. <p>If you are always on the lookout for the latest word game, then look no further. Rebus Puzzles will be your next addiction. Find the common catch phrase, saying, or word using cryptic images and the custom built keyboard. This is a fun and challenging word game that can keep you entertained for hours! </p><p>The game is played by solving riddles using a keyboard of scrambled letters. You receive a cryptic hint for each level in a single picture. These pictures are made up of letters, words, and symbols which represent the answer. Once the correct word is entered, the riddle is solved! This game comes with hints, you can remove incorrect letters from the game and/or reveal correct letters (in no particular order).</p><p>An example of a phrase would be three blue clouds with the word sky in each of them. The correct answer would be blue skies. Another would be the word don’t on top of a line with react underneath. The correct answer would be don’t over react. Easy enough, right?</p><p>Rebus Puzzles is a challenging and fun word game! To remove a letter, simply tap on the letter, the undo button, or the reset all button. Use your coins to buy reveal hints and remove incorrect letters. </p><p>Running out of coins? No problem! Rebus Puzzles awards you with 20 coins for every new day you play. Earn coins for every game you get right. Play against friends to see who can get the highest score. Have a challenge period, and the loser buys lunch!</p><p>The game features 240 different puzzles from 8 categories. This challenging game is a great way to de-stress, relax or kill some time. If you have a child that loves words, this may be a fun way to have them learn more words and/or solve puzzles! It can be a great learning tool for the right child.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" Everyone downloads the app, then you PLAY IN PERSON with your friends. Each round, a new dealer chooses a card, and players fill in the blank. The dealer reads the cards aloud and hilarity ensues. Bring the Rukkus anywhere, anytime, with anyone! <p><br>Features:</p><p>PLAY IN PERSON- Use your phones to laugh and socialize in person with 2-8 people (5 or 6 people is the sweet spot). Just cards.</p><p>POPULAR VOTE- Everyone can vote for their favorite card at the end of each round.</p><p>SCORES- We keep score for you. 3 points for dealer pick, 2 for popular vote, and 1 for honorable mention. </p><p>SHARE CARDS- Whenever you get that perfect combination that you need to share with your friends- text it, Tweet it, post it on Facebook. </p><p>DISCARD- Discard cards you don’t like. Connect Words  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=G+Soft+Team" title="G Soft Team">G Soft Team</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.gsoftteam.connectwords"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaJAoiEiAKGmNvbS5nc29mdHRlYW0uY29ubmVjdHdvcmRzEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Play a wonderful brain teaser game of connect words. Find words hidden in a grid and connect them one by one. Three difficulty levels are available so you can pick up at any level and sharpen your word skills. <p>Ready to train your focus and exercise your crossword skills? Download and play now! 600+ levels and over 10000 different word grids for you to enjoy - for FREE.</p><p><br></p><p>★ ★ ★ FEATURES ★ ★ ★ </p><p>Connect Words features:</p><p>✓ 600+ levels that will keep your brain active. Each new level will present you with a different grid of words you have to find and as you advance you will improve your word skills and sharpen your mind.</p><p>✓ 3 difficulty levels: easy, medium and hard;</p><p>✓ 10000+ different word grids. For each level there are 20 possible word grids and every time you replay the level you can enjoy a different word grid.</p><p>✓ smooth and intuitive interface</p><p>✓ attractive sound effects and nice, refreshing game music</p><p>✓ Daily Rewards. You will receive a daily reward for each day you play.</p><p>✓ Hours of pure brain enjoyment, easy to play and progressively more challenging as you advance through the levels! </p><p><br><br>★ ★ ★ TIPS ★ ★ ★ </p><p>1.	Look for a valid word in the list above the letter grid.<br>2.	Once you find a word that matches one in the list, start connecting it.<br>3.	Press on the first letter and then sweep along a continuous string of letters to connect your word.<br>4.	The word will start to blink when all its letters are connected. Release the screen and collect the points.<br>5.	The longer the word the bigger the score. When you connect a 4 letter word the value of each letter is 10 points. For each additional letter the value per letter increases by 10 points.<br>6.	Use multipliers to increase the points per word n-fold. Multipliers can generate a maximum 100 fold increase.<br>7.	Sometimes it is difficult to spot a word. If you like the reveal the troubling word just press on the word and a reveal menu will appear.</p><p><br><br></p><p>★ Google Play Game Services ★Log in with your Google Play Game Services Account. Collect all the achievements and reach the top spots of the global LeaderBoards. Challenge your friends and circles to get the highest scores on the Leaderboards! </p><p>★ FACEBOOK ★ Connect Words is a mobile social game. You can ask and receive lives from your friends. No need to worry. We do not send any messages to your Facebook friends. And you can control what you share by going to Settings &gt; Other Settings. You can still play this game without a Facebook connection.</p><p><br></p><p>Connect Words is completely free to play. You can complete all levels without making a single purchase. However, if you want, you can speed up your progress by making in-app purchases for extra lives or suggestions. The bill payer should always be consulted beforehand. By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service: http://www.gsoftteam.com/eula</p><p><br></p><p>★ Support and Feedback<br>If you have any technical problems please email us directly at support@gsoftteam.com. How it helps to improve English vocabulary ? The game selects a word, which you don't know. The word to guess is represented by a row of dashes, giving the number of letters, numbers and category. If the guessing player suggests a letter or number which occurs in the word, the Hangman game writes it in all its correct positions. If the suggested letter or number does not occur in the word, the Hangman game draws one element of a hanged man stick figure as a tally mark. The game is over when player completes the words or Hangman diagram is completed. Each mistake is a step to promotion. Don't know the word! Not a problem! Hangman will show you an advice which describe meaning of the word.<p>Do you like crosswords, Joker, Scrabble and other word puzzle games with words? 飲み会・合コン・パーティーで大盛り上がり<p>楽しい飲み会のはずが、話題が見つからず沈黙になってしまうことはありませんか？そんなときはこれ超大盛り上がり間違いなしの定番ゲーム！みんなで笑って、飲んで、ジェスチャーすれば、すぐに打ち解けること間違いなし！気になるあの子の、怖い上司の意外な一面が見られるかも？！お子様向けの問題もあるので、親子で遊ぶのも楽しいですよ。<br>期間限定の無料ダウンロードは今のうちに☆</p><p>■注意事項<br>端末によっては録画再生保存ができない場合がありますので、ご了承ください。</p><p>■対応ＯＳ<br>Android 4.0以上</p><p>■遊び方<br>1. 挑戦する「カード」を選択し、【Play】を押してください。<br>2. チーム分け（２人以上）：<br>(1) 解答者は自分の額の上もしくは胸の前に機器を持っていきます。 <br>(2) 解答を教えてあげる人は、お題に従ってジェスチャーをしてください。<br>3. 制限時間は60秒、お題にしたがってジェスチャーをしてください。<br>(1) 正解=正解をした場合は、画面を下に向けてください。<br>(2) パス=分からない場合は、画面を上に向けてください。<br>4. ゲームが終了すると、成績が発表されます。<br>5. 終了後、撮影した動画を楽しむことができます。</p><p>■ ゲームポイント <br>1.様々なお題で頭の体操！ <br>表現力・想像力・瞬発力を鍛えられるアプリ。<br>日本をテーマにしたお題もあるよ。 </p><p>2. 撮影記録<br>一分一秒たりとも逃しません！<br>お子様やご家族、友人や会社のゲームで撮影をして思い出を残そう。<br>撮影した動画はシェアをすることができるよ。</p><p>3. 成績記録<br>阿吽の呼吸とはまさにこの事？！１０問連続正解できるかな？</p><p>■ 遊び方の秘訣 </p><p>1. 初心者入門<br>初めにウォーミングアップとして「職業」を選ぶと分かりやすいです。体全体を使ってジェスチャーをすることで、相手にわかりやすく伝わります。 </p><p>2. 大人数で楽しもう<br>一人が解答者となり、残りのみんなでジェスチャーをして遊ぶことができます。誰が一番上手かな。</p><p>3. 英語の勉強<br>英語のアルファベットを体で表現して解答を伝えるのもいいですね、英語の勉強になるかもしれません！ただし、答えを口に出してはいけませんよ。 ORACOLO BOCCA DELLA VERITA  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=enfandroid" title="enfandroid">enfandroid</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="appinventor.ai_enfandroid.bocca"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKQonEiUKH2FwcGludmVudG9yLmFpX2VuZmFuZHJvaWQuYm9jY2EQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Finalmente un'app originale!<br>La famosa Bocca Della Verità, sarà il tuo ORACOLO TASCABILE!<p>Quest'app si prenderà cura di te rispondendo a qualsiasi domanda! Saprà darti consigli utili, ti farà ridere con i suoi aforismi,  barzellette, stupirti con le sue previsioni, illuminarti con proverbi, enigmi, indovinelli e perle di saggezza, il tutto accompagnato dalle sue smorfie buffe. </p><p>Fai delle domande sul tuo futuro, sulle tue relazioni sentimentali, sul lavoro, scuola, amore, salute e altro, poi tieni premuto il dito sulla bocca e ascolta o leggi le risposte. La bocca della verità saprà leggerti nella mente o nel cuore, come il miglior mentalista o mago e darti le risposte che cerchi, altro che cartomanti , veggenti e tarocchi, affidati a quest'app!<br>Oppure puoi scegliere se ascoltare i proverbi dell'oracolo, proverbi del mese, indovinelli o barzellette.</p><p>Provala e non te ne pentirai, piace a tutti adulti, ragazzi e bambini. </p><p>Tramite quest'app puoi inoltre condividere le immagini delle espressioni divertenti che assumerà, insieme alla frase che recita. Puoi inoltre, modificare la frase e scriverne una tua personalizzata da condividere con i tuoi amici attraverso i vari social network o via email. Ottima per il cazzeggio e per la condivisione di messaggi divertenti e originali. </p><p>CARATTERISTICHE:</p><p>Nel menù opzioni (rotellina in alto a destra)  potrete accedere alle seguenti sezioni:</p><p>- ATTIVARE/DISATTIVARE AUDIO<br>- ATTIVARE/DISATTIVARE VIBRAZIONE</p><p>- Scelta della tipologia di gioco :<br>1) ORACOLO con domande e risposte adatte per ogni vostro quesito<br>2) AFORISMI E BATTUTE  ideali per passare il tempo e farsi due risate<br>3) PROVERBI - molti dei proverbi più famosi<br>4) INDOVINELLI DIVERTENTI - simpatiche battute adatte a tutte l'età<br>5) INDOVINELLI SUI NOMI - indovinelli divertenti su nomi fantasiosi<br>6) INDOVINELLI SEMPLICI - adatti ad ogni età<br>7) PROVERBI DEL MESE - tutti i proverbi più famosi sui mesi dell'anno </p><p>SOLO IN LINGUA ITALIANA</p><p>Ispirato dalla vera Bocca della Verità di cui riporto sotto parte della descrizione presa da wikipedia:</p><p>La Bocca della Verità è un antico mascherone in marmo, murato nella parete del pronao della chiesa di Santa Maria in Cosmedin di Roma dal 1632.<br>Il mascherone rappresenta un volto maschile barbato; occhi, naso e bocca sono forati e cavi. Il volto è stato interpretato nel tempo come raffigurazione di vari soggetti: Giove Ammone, il dio Oceano, un oracolo.<br>Quel che è certo è che il mascherone gode di fama antica e leggendaria e  gli  viene attribuito il potere di pronunciare oracoli. <br>Il nome "Bocca della verità" comparve nel 1485 e la scultura rimase da allora costantemente menzionata tra le curiosità romane, venendo frequentemente riprodotta in disegni e stampe.<br>Dalle file di turisti che ancor oggi aspettano di farsi fotografare con la mano nella bocca "magica", si può dedurre quale interesse ancora essa incuta nelle menti di molti viaggiatori.</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" </span> </div>  <div class="description">  “英文打字练习 - 酸雨”是一个打字练习游戏。<p>这个概念是这样的。<br>一个字从顶部移到底部是一个下拉酸雨。<br>你必须键入单词，这样一滴酸雨不能达到的塔。<br>如果酸雨打塔或底部，这是海，塔就会生锈。<br>多少生锈塔是由心脏测量仪在左上角代表。</p><p>作为电平上升，酸雨滴速度将会增加。<br>因此，你需要越来越快的类型。</p><p>有几个“病毒”的话：清除病毒，凝固病毒，矿山病毒，慢病毒，快速病毒，集群病毒，恢复病毒，并隐藏病毒。<br>有些病毒是好的，其余的都是坏的。</p><p>例如，当有大量的酸雨的话，你可以不消除清除病毒是非常有用的。它消除了所有酸雨的话，同时增加得分。</p><p>在其他的手，集群病毒是可怕的，它结合许多其他酸雨滴“朋友” 。</p><p>其实，这个打字游戏是由一个名为“ Hanmetaja ”，这是最有名的打字游戏在韩国的时候286 ， 386 ， 486个普遍存在的非常流行的打字游戏的动机。所以，你可以感受到设计和声音都有些老气。 ： - ）</p><p>您可以选择起始水平，当你启动应用程序。<br>你也可以把你的名字在排行榜上的，如果你打高分。</p><p>这是很好的赌与朋友或同事的饮料。 ： ）</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.cklee.veneziaenglish" aria-hidden="true" Kelimeleri parmağınızı her bir harften sonra sağa, sola, yukarı, aşağı veya çapraz harflere götürerek bulabilirsiniz. </p><p>Kelime buldukça kelimenin uzunluğuna ve geçen süreye göre puan hesaplanır. Слова из Слов  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=BGA" title="BGA">BGA</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.games.makewords2"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHgocEhoKFGNvbS5nYW1lcy5tYWtld29yZHMyEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Cоставляйте слова из букв другого слова, представленного вам на уровне.<p>Например на уровне вам попалось слово "СЛОВА", тогда вводите "сало", "сова", "оса" и "овал" и т.д.<br>Вспомните всё, что вы знаете, старайтесь и вы пройдете даже самые сложные уровни. Обратите внимание, что можно составлять слова длинной от 3-х букв.</p><p>На каждом уровне можно составить десятки слов. На некоторых уровнях это число превышает 150!<br>Значение каждого неизвестного вам ранее слова вы сможете узнать, воспользовавшись подсказкой.<br>Вводите слова и они будут добавляться на экран. Позже вы сможете посмотреть значение любого слова просто нажав на него.</p><p>Интересная развивающая игра "Слова из Слов" поможет вам провести время с удовольствием.</p><p>Играйте, развивайтесь, Buddies Words Out - FREE  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Mywavia+Studios" title="Mywavia Studios">Mywavia Studios</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.mywavia.wof"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaGQoXEhUKD2NvbS5teXdhdmlhLndvZhABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Once out there in a serene neighborhood, Children were playing Duck,duck,goose. Close by passes a truck dropping a box of ice cream. Curious, as always, the kids inspect and start fighting to get hold of all ice cream.<p>'Buddies Words out!' helps resolve the scuffle. Ice cream is put on top of a tree with 3 branches to climb. Solve the puzzle from the opponent and get the kid close to the ice cream and finally win it. The player guesses the word similar to Hangman, where you have few lives!</p><p>Each player makes a word, using power-ups if needed, and sends it to his opponent. Later he waits for the opponent to guess the word. The opponent might use many power-ups to guess it correctly. Then its the opponent's turn to make a word and lets you guess his word. But make sure you wont leave your opponent hanging around. Guess his word faster so it'd be fun for him. Whoever gets to the top of the tree with 3 branches wins the game.</p><p>Power-ups: Power ups guide you to create a more interesting word or solve a puzzle successfully faster.</p><p><br>I.  Single Player Mode :<br> •  Single player - Solve the words challenged by the computer <br> •  Pass and Play - Play with the person sitting next to you. Create a word and hand over the device to solve </p><p>II.  Multi Player Mode :<br> •  Play Live with people around the world in real time <br> •  Play with your friends <br> •  Start a game with Random opponent. Chat and make new friends </p><p>III. Buy virtual items from the Shop and compare your rankings on the Leader Board </p><p>Try Buddies, Words Out, Now! </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  احزر الصورة <p>مقدمة عن اللعبة:<br>لعبة احزر الصورة أو ما تسمى بلعبة تخمين الصورة هي لعبة رائعة ومميزة للفئات العمرية المختلفة.<br>لعبة احز الصورة نقدمها الآن وباللغة العربية فهي لعبة تعليمية بالدرجة الأولى للفئات العمرية الصغيرة.<br>تقوم اللعلبة بشكل أساسي على تعليم الأطفال المفردات باللغة العربية بأسلوب مسلي وممتع. <br>بلعبة احزر الصورة تساعد على تقوية الذاكرة والتركيز وتنشط الدماغ.<br>يوجد العديد من وسائل المساعدة كي تساعدك على ايجاد الحل والحصول على النقود لاكمال معرفة اسماء جميع الصور.<br>يوجد العديد من الأصناف وصور كثيرة في كل صنف.</p><p>كيفية اللعب:<br>*  قم اختيار احدى أصناف اللعب (حيوانات ـ رياضة ـ فواكه ـ أعلام دول ـ وغيرها) نقوم باختيار احداها.<br>* بعد ذلك قم باختيار احدى الصور المعروضة ضمن الصنف المختار.<br>* عليك مواصلة مسيرة اللعبة.</p><p>ميزات اللعبة:<br>* مجموعة كبيرة من الأصناف.<br>* عدد كبير من الصور الرائعة.<br>* وسائل مساعدة تساعدك في مواصلة اللعب ولانهاء كل المستويات الموجودة.<br>* رصيد يومي في حال كنت تواظب على اللعب كل يوم.<br>* اللعبة رائعة وتناسب جميع الاجهزة وتحتوي على صور مميزة وواجهات محببة للأطفال.</p><p>إن معظم الصور المستخدمة في التطبيق هي مستخدمة تحت شهادة موثقة من قبل Простота и удобный интерфейс, приятный глазу дизайн, возможность ведения нескольких игр одновременно – неоспоримые достоинства данного релиза. Вы можете играть с другом, по сети или с компьютером на разных уровнях сложности. Найдите слово, составьте, раскрасьте игровое поле!<p>Правила игры просты, однако подумать все равно придётся: игровое поле размером 5×5 заполнено случайными буквами, из которых вы составляете слова. Чем длиннее ваше слово, тем больше очков оно принесет. Каждая использованная буква окрашивается в цвет игрока, ее использовавшего – вы можете составлять слова из букв соперника и лишать его баллов, а можете захватить букву, окружив ее своими. За такую букву ваш противник больше не сможет получать очки. Когда вы задействуете все клетки поля, игра закончится.</p><p>Похожие игры:<br>Леттерпресс, Балда, Словохват, Эрудит, Слова из слова</p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a Caça Palavras  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Androbros" title="Androbros">Androbros</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.androbros.wordsearchportuguese"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaLAoqEigKImNvbS5hbmRyb2Jyb3Mud29yZHNlYXJjaHBvcnR1Z3Vlc2UQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Fans de Caça-Palavras! Nós temos boas notícias para vocês! Caça-Palavras está agora traduzido em Português do Brasil com um placar de líderes online no Google+.<br>Desafie seu cérebro com essa app de quebrar a cabeça e melhore o seu racionício!<p>Funcionalidades:<br>- Placar de líderes online<br>- Desafie seus amigos<br>- Quantidade quase infinita de caça-palavras aleatórios<br>- Suporta tablets e todos os tamanhos de telas</p><p>Consiga as pontuações mais altas e dispute contra seus amigos e outros fãs de caça-palavras!</p><p>Há 12 palavras escondidas na horizontal, vertical ou diagonal em uma tela de 10 por 10. Seu objetivo é encontrar essas palavras o mais rápido possível.<br>A pontuação é calculada com base no comprimento das palavras encontradas e o tempo decorrido. Quando você encontrar todas as palavras do quebra-cabeça, a pontuação é enviada para o placar de líderes online no Google+. Você pode ver os melhores jogadores do dia, da semana ou de todos os tempos.<br>Se você não quiser fazer login com Google+, você ainda pode jogar o jogo no modo offline, mas nesse caso a sua pontuação não é submetida ao placar de líderes online.<br>Divirtam-se!</p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target"   Kelime Bulmaca  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Androbros" title="Androbros">Androbros</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.androbros.wordsearch"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIgogEh4KGGNvbS5hbmRyb2Jyb3Mud29yZHNlYXJjaBABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Haydi kelime bulmaca tutkunları buraya!!! Kelimeleri en hızlı siz bulun, yüksek puanlar kazanın ve arkadaşlarınızla ve diğer Kelime Bulmaca oynayanlarla yarışın... Haydi kelime oyunu sevenler, heyecan sizi bekliyor! <p>Kelime Bulmaca 10x10'luk bir tahtada sağa, sola, yukarı, aşağı, çapraz ve ters çapraz olarak yerleştirilmiş 12 kelimeyi en hızlı şekilde bulmayi amaclayan bir kelime oyunudur. </p><p>Kelime buldukça kelimenin uzunluğuna ve geçen süreye göre puan hesaplanır. Sözcük uzunluğu alınan puanı artırır. Aynı zamanda kelimeler ne kadar kısa sürede bulunursa alınan puan da o kadar fazla olur.</p><p>Bütün sözcükleri bulduğunuzda aldığınız puan sunucuya gönderilir. Bu puanlar Google Play'in sağladığı yüksek skorlar servisi kullanılarak sıralanır. Sıralamalar günlük, haftalık ve tüm zamanlar olmak üzere ayrı ayrı tutulur.</p><p>Oyunu hem online (çevrim içi) hem de offline (çevrim dışı) olarak oynayabilirsiniz. Online oynayabilmeniz için Google+ hesabınızla oturum açmanız gerekir. Oturum açmadan offline olarak da oynayabilirsiniz. Ancak offline oyun sırasında kazandığınız puanlar sıralamaya katılmaz. Bir başka deyişle offline modda skorunuz sunucuya gönderilemediği için yüksek skor olarak değerlendirilemez.</p><p>Herkese iyi eğlenceler...</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.androbros.wordsearch" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> </div>     <div class="reason-set">  <span class="stars-container"> <a href="/store/apps/details?id=com.androbros.wordsearch" tabindex="-1"> <div class="reason-set-star-rating">  <div class="tiny-star star-rating-non-editable-container" aria-label="獲評為 3.7 顆星 (總分 5 顆星)"> <div class="current-rating" style="width: 73.79288673400879%;"></div> </div>  </div> </a> <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.androbros.wordsearch"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIgogEh4KGGNvbS5hbmRyb2Jyb3Mud29yZHNlYXJjaBABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </span> </div> </div>   </div><div class="card no-rationale square-cover apps small" data-docid="com.sixwaves.emojiphrase" data-original-classes="card no-rationale square-cover apps small" data-short-classes="card no-rationale square-cover apps small"> <div class="card-content id-track-click id-track-impression" data-docid="com.sixwaves.emojiphrase" data-server-cookie="CAIaIgogEh4KGGNvbS5zaXh3YXZlcy5lbW9qaXBocmFzZRABGAM=" data-uitype="500">  <a class="card-click-target" data-server-cookie="CAIaIgogEh4KGGNvbS5zaXh3YXZlcy5lbW9qaXBocmFzZRABGAM=" data-uitype="500" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.sixwaves.emojiphrase" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a> <div class="cover"> <div class="cover-image-container"> <div class="cover-outer-align"> <div class="cover-inner-align"> <img alt="Emoji Phrase™ - href="/store/apps/details?id=com.debia.zagadkisto" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.debia.zagadkisto" title="100 Загадок - отгадай загадки"> 462.    100 Загадок - отгадай загадки  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=DeBIA" title="DeBIA">DeBIA</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.debia.zagadkisto"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHgocEhoKFGNvbS5kZWJpYS56YWdhZGtpc3RvEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Загадки - это великая сокровищница человеческой мысли. Они собрали в себе мудрость и тягу к знаниям. Не случайно в сказках герои так часто загадывают загадки. Мудрость была в почете всегда(загадки). Особенно это видно в русских народных сказках. Попробуйте проверить свою догадливость и сообразительность отгадывая загадки. Попробуйте поиграть с детьми в "угадалки".<br>100 Загадок - игра на русском языке для детей.<br>В древнейших загадках отражалась первобытная мифическая символизация; поэтический образ служил здесь отчасти для описания, отчасти для объяснения явлений природы и окружающей среды(загадки). С течением времени это значение загадок утратилось; осталась лишь её иносказательная аллегорическая форма, уцелел её сильный, образный язык, и народ стал смотреть на загадки, как на простое упражнение ума. В древности загадкам приписывалось особое таинственное значение: в народном эпосе она является одним из видов так называемого «Божьего суда»: отгадывание загадки ведёт к исполнению желаний, освобождает от опасности . Загадывание и отгадывание загадки, состязание в загадках составляет весьма распространённый мотив народного эпоса и создавшейся под его влиянием книжной литературы. Русские и другие славянские песни с загадками в общем примыкают к циклу сказаний о «мудрой девице» и клонятся к доказательству того, что невеста не глупее жениха. <br>В игре собраны сто загадок, доступ к которым получается последовательно от первой загадки ко второй и так далее.<br>Вы всегда можете вернуться к любой разгаданной загадке и разгадать её ещё раз.<br>Debia создаёт лучшие детские игры про загадки на русском языке для детей.<br>Новая игра от создателей "100 Ребусов" и "Составь Слова" - загадки. <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.debia.zagadkisto" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  </div> </div>     <div class="reason-set">  <span class="stars-container"> <a href="/store/apps/details?id=com.debia.zagadkisto" tabindex="-1"> <div class="reason-set-star-rating">  <div class="tiny-star star-rating-non-editable-container" aria-label="獲評為 4.7 顆星 (總分 5 顆星)"> <div class="current-rating" style="width: 93.49185943603516%;"></div> </div>  </div> </a> <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.debia.zagadkisto"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHgocEhoKFGNvbS5kZWJpYS56YWdhZGtpc3RvEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </span> </div> </div>   </div><div class="card no-rationale square-cover apps small" data-docid="com.themelisx.myscrambledword" data-original-classes="card no-rationale square-cover apps small" data-short-classes="card no-rationale square-cover apps small"> <div class="card-content id-track-click id-track-impression" data-docid="com.themelisx.myscrambledword" data-server-cookie="CAIaJwolEiMKHWNvbS50aGVtZWxpc3gubXlzY3JhbWJsZWR3b3JkEAEYAw==" data-uitype="500">  <a class="card-click-target" data-server-cookie="CAIaJwolEiMKHWNvbS50aGVtZWxpc3gubXlzY3JhbWJsZWR3b3JkEAEYAw==" data-uitype="500" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.themelisx.myscrambledword" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a> <div class="cover"> <div class="cover-image-container"> <div class="cover-outer-align"> <div class="cover-inner-align"> <img alt="Scramble - class="description">  Το κλασικό παιχνίδι αναγραμματισμού των λέξεων, τώρα στο κινητό σας.<br>Βρες τη σωστή λέξη στον χρόνο που σου δίνει η εφαρμογή και μάζεψε πόντους.<br>Στην διάθεσή σας 5.200 Palavras Cruzadas Brasileiro  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Berni+Mobile" title="Berni Mobile">Berni Mobile</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.berniiiiiiii.palavrascruzadas"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaKwopEicKIWNvbS5iZXJuaWlpaWlpaWkucGFsYXZyYXNjcnV6YWRhcxABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Um grande jogo de palavras cruzadas!<p>- Jogo infinito graças a redes dinâmicas<br>- Escolha um nível de dificuldade ( 3 )<br>- Escolha o número de colunas (3...25)<br>- Escolha o número de linhas (3...25)<br>- A tela se ajusta automaticamente para o seu dispositivo<br>- Os racks estão cheios de palavras que atravessam e se cruzam</p><p>um passatempo divertido e com aprendizado!!!</p><p>Palavras Cruzadas em Português Brasileiro gratis</p><p>O jogo de palavras cruzadas ( cruzadinha ) é um passatempo bastante difundido. Consiste de várias linhas formadas por quadrados em branco, algumas na vertical e outras na horizontal, que se cruzam umas com as outras. Cada linha deve ser preenchida por uma palavra, e cada palavra deve ser descoberta através de dicas que acompanham as cruzadas. Ao se preencher uma das linhas, automaticamente se preenche alguns quadrados das outras linhas que a cruzam, tornando mais fácil sua resolução<br> <br>As primeiras cruzadas modernas foram elaboradas por Arthur Wynne e publicadas no jornal New York World, em 1913. Entretanto uma forma rústica do jogo já existia no Antigo Egito. Durante a Segunda Guerra Mundial, as forças armadas britânicas recrutaram especialistas em palavras cruzadas para tentar decifrar códigos.</p><p>raciocínio, jogos educativos, jogos para crianças, adolescentes, família, didáticos, conhecimentos gerais, quebra cabeças , palavra mania , crusada</p><p>Você gosta das revistas de palavras cruzadas e caça palavras? Crazy about word games? Then you are going to love this app.<br>Lingo - Free is a fun, challenging word-guessing game.<p><br>The aim of this game is to find hidden words. Type in letters from keypad (at the bottom of the screen) to enter a word. The letters turn green, red, yellow or grey as you enter a word. Green indicates correct letter at the right position. Yellow indicates a correct letter but at wrong position. Red indicates a wrong letter and grey indicates an invalid word.<br>Be quick as you only have limited time and use "Hint" if you are stuck. Sounds like an easy job? Try harder levels and packs. There are 540 different games in this free version and more will be added soon. So enjoy and stay tuned!</p><p>There are two modes: Classic and Finals. In Classic mode, practice with lots of different levels and prepare yourself for Finals. In Finals mode, guess as many words as you can in 2 minutes 30 seconds. Then draw balls to achieve Lingo!</p><p>In Finals mode, every game you play costs 1000 points. If you achieve Lingo, you get 1000 points for each word you guess. If you don't achieve Lingo then you get 100 points for each word you guess. Tonbegin with, you get 100000 points to play. You can  buy more points if you run out of them.</p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.xelabtech.android.lingo"    Guess The Words  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=MerigoTech" title="MerigoTech">MerigoTech</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.geoalex.guessword.en"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIgogEh4KGGNvbS5nZW9hbGV4Lmd1ZXNzd29yZC5lbhABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Are you addicted to word games such as scrabble, hangman and other word puzzles? Then here is something that is more interesting and even better for you. “Guess The Words” is a new words puzzle game that is fun to play either alone or with friends. It has a very simple concept just like its name; guess the correct English word and you get the maximum score.<p>This game entails you to guess the hidden English words by creating them from letters provided and get a maximum score if your guess was right. Experiencing some difficulties in guessing the right words? You don’t have to worry, just touch a word and you’ll see some hint in a hilarious way. If you still cannot get the words right, you can mix up the bunch letters to come up with a word that can in some way result to another word. You’ll as well get a score for it.</p><p>This game has 540 carefully prepared levels that you’ll work on, you’re required to establish one word derived from four pictures. Every level has around 10 to 20 hidden words for you to search and find correctly. You’ll be left thinking deeply and carefully on how to find the right word that will match the mix of letters provided.</p><p>This word puzzle game has levels that are quite easy and some levels such as the master are very tricky and challenging. The mystery of searching and guessing the correct words makes this game enjoyable and addictive. You’ll be rewarded for every correct word that you come up with.</p><p>Pros<br>·       It’s simple to play<br>·       Some of the levels are simple but become tricky as you pass through levels<br>·       Fun to play<br>·       Has very cool graphics and sounds too<br>·       Has widespread vocabulary that have thousands of English nouns<br>·       Integrates hundreds of levels<br>·       Have hilarious hints<br>·       It’s the new trend, so don’t be left out. You can play with your friends too to be more entertaining.</p><p>Cons<br>·       The game is so addictive that you’ll never get enough of it.<br> <br>So far “Guess The Words”, has received worldwide recognition and great reviews. The following are 5 star rating from some of the users:</p><p>★★★★★ Such a magnificent game. Carefully prepared with awesome graphics. Fun and addictive. Но зато с ее помощью можно приятно провести время в кругу семьи и друзей, а также пополнить свой лексикон новыми словами и расширить кругозор.<br> Собери слова из слова в этой игре.<br>  Программа предлагает длинное слово, из букв которого необходимо составить нарицательные имена существительные единственного числа (от трех букв и выше). За каждое составленное слово игроку начисляется один балл за каждую букву слова.<br>  Разумеется, здесь не обойтись без эрудиции, умения быстро перебирать варианты и составлять анаграммы из слова. <br> На данный момент в игре доступны более полутора слов, из которых можно составить несколько тысяч слов меньшего размера.<br>  Игра допускает возможность просмотра значения слова - достаточно просто нажать на него.<br>  Присутствует возможность получения подсказки и даже помощь в отгадывании целого слова.<br>На данный момент можно собрать около тысячи слов из слова в игре "Составь слова". Слова из слова легко составляются.<br> Слава победителям этой игры в слова! Игра поможет улучшить и правописание, вы больше не будете писать саставь слова из слова, а только составь слова из слова. 脳を鍛えるあるなしクイズ2  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=pules" title="pules">pules</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="jp.pules.braintraining2"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIQofEh0KF2pwLnB1bGVzLmJyYWludHJhaW5pbmcyEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  このアプリは認知症予防の脳トレになるだけでなく、子供とも遊べる、あるなしクイズアプリです。<br>前作とは違った問題で楽しく遊びましょう。<p>＜あるなしクイズの遊び方＞<br>「ある」と「なし」に分けられた言葉をもとに、共通点や特徴のある点を見つけ出しましょう。<br>その共通点や特徴を元に、「ある」か「なし」かを判断してください。</p><p>＜このアプリについて＞<br>問題は全部で30問！<br>問題はランダムに出題されています。</p><p>問題を取得するためにインターネット接続できる必要があります。<br>簡単にTwitterで記録を報告することもできます。</p><p>【メディア掲載実績】<br>・mobile ASCII<br>・Exciteニュース</p><p>日常生活では、脳の同じ部分を使いがちです。私も子供のときと比べるとすごく頭が固くなっています。<br>頭を柔らかくするにはクイズは簡単で良いのですが、テレビ番組のクイズはスピードが早かったりしますからじっくり脳を使えていないことがあります。<br>このアプリを作った理由は、私と同じようにスマートフォンで脳トレがしたいという方が多かったからです。</p><p>このアプリは認知症予防の脳トレにも使えますし、親子でも楽しめるのでコミュニケーションのきっかけにもなります。<br>いますぐアプリをインストールしてあるなしクイズを楽しみましょう！</p><p>もしよろしければアプリのご感想、ご要望をレビューに書いていただけると幸いです。 <br>よろしくお願い致します。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=jp.pules.braintraining2" aria-hidden="true" Wordsplosion  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Concrete+Software,+Inc." title="Concrete Software, Inc.">Concrete Software, Inc.</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.concretesoftware.wordsplosion_google"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaMgowEi4KKGNvbS5jb25jcmV0ZXNvZnR3YXJlLndvcmRzcGxvc2lvbl9nb29nbGUQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Race against the clock! <p>It sounds simple enough for a word game: You get 5 tries to guess a 5 letter word and we’ll even give you the first letter. No problem, right? Well, you’d better be quick because the clock is ticking, and if you take too long...BOOM!</p><p>Did you hear that? That was a Wordsplosion! — and the next one you hear might be your last!</p><p>Performance-based hint system!</p><p>Wordsplosion isn’t easy (it wouldn’t be much of a word game if it was), but if you keep a clear head and a steady hand you’ll earn free letters to help you out when you get in a jam. And the more words you guess, the more hints you’ll get!</p><p>Huge Dictionary</p><p>From Abyss to Zesty, if it is a five letter English word, you’ll find it in Wordsplosion! We chucked out a few for being too hard (and a few more to keep it clean), but you’d be hard pressed to find a word we forgot about.</p><p>How long can you go before the detonator blows? It’s time to find out. It’s time to play the fast-paced word game that always keeps you guessing: Wordsplosion!</p><p>Game Features:<br>•	Wordsplosive, rapid-fire word game action!<br>•	Letter-ifically huge dictionary with thousands of possible words!<br>•	Gorgeous graphics and bomb-tastic sound effects!<br>•	Performance-based hint system</p><p><br>More games from Concrete Software:<br>PBA Bowling Challenge<br>Aces 482.    Caça Palavras Brasileiro  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Berni+Mobile" title="Berni Mobile">Berni Mobile</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.berniiiiiiii.braz"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHwodEhsKFWNvbS5iZXJuaWlpaWlpaWkuYnJhehABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Encontrar palavras escondidas!<p>- Escolha um nível de dificuldade ( 4 )<br>- Escolher o tamanho ( 4x4 ... 20x20 )<br>- Jogo infinito graças a redes dinâmicas<br>- A tela se ajusta automaticamente para o seu dispositivo<br>- Os racks estão cheios de palavras que atravessam e se cruzam</p><p>O jogo de caça-palavras, ou sopa de letras, ou sopa de letrinhas é um passatempo que consiste de letras arranjadas aparentemente aleatórias em uma grade quadrada ou retangular.  Hooked on Words  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Plasmaworks+LLC" title="Plasmaworks LLC">Plasmaworks LLC</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.plasmaworks.wordjam"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIQofEh0KF2NvbS5wbGFzbWF3b3Jrcy53b3JkamFtEAEYAw==" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  *** Over 1.5 Million Downloads on iOS ***<p>Unlike games like&nbsp;Hanging With Friends&nbsp;or&nbsp;Words With Friends, which are limited by their format or the strength of the opposition, there’s a much greater feeling of variety in Hooked on Words<br>"5 out of 5" –Appolicious</p><p>Hooked on Words is the exciting new word search game that brings a fun and addicting twist to the genre with its innovative bonus tile system. With its eye popping visuals and smooth as silk mechanics Hooked on Words is sure to have you coming back time and time again. Best of all it’s free to play with no coins to buy or gameplay designed to force you to purchase additional items. Spell words in any direction to clear that word from the board and then watch as new letters fall in their place. Spell bigger words to earn bonus tiles that can help extend your game and achieve bigger scores. With its 4 game modes there is a little something for everyone whether you like to take your time and strategize or prefer fast and furious action. Once a game is over you can track your best words and scores and even see where you stack up against other players from around the world with the unique in game viewing system for Swarm leaderboards. So what are you waiting for? If you love word search games like Boggle, Word Search, Scrabble, Wurdle and Spelltower then download Hooked on Words and get one of the best word search games available today.</p><p>Standard Mode: Play at your own pace as you strategize to spell bigger words and earn bonus tiles.</p><p>Timed Mode: Players get 2 minutes and an unlimited supply of letter tiles to spell as many words as possible.</p><p>Collapse Mode: Try and clear the board and keep your letter tile count as low as possible as new letters fall into place at a faster and faster rate. Bigger words give you bonuses to clear extra letters.</p><p>Scramble Mode: A static 6 x 7 board where letters don’t change and players have 2 minutes to spell as many words as possible.</p><p>New Extended Mode: Endless supply of letter tiles with a limited number of moves as you try to fill the points meter and reach the next level. Play at your own pace and strategize the biggest possible words. How far can you get? </p><p>Features at a glance:&nbsp; · 5 Word search game modes&nbsp; · Universal App · Results system that keeps track of your best words and scores&nbsp; · Swarm leaderboards and achievements</p><p> Note from the developer: First of all we’d like to say thank you to everyone who decided to give Hooked on Words a try. In an effort to make word search games accessible to everyone we wanted to provide the game for free so that players everywhere can enjoy it. We hope once you try it you’ll be “Hooked” and will share the game with your friends and family. If you really love the game please support us via the in app purchase to remove ads so that we can continue to bring you great content.<br>Have a suggestion for a word you’d like to see in Hooked on Words? href="/store/apps/details?id=jp.pules.braintraining" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=jp.pules.braintraining" title="脳を鍛えるあるなしクイズ"> 487.    脳を鍛えるあるなしクイズ  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=pules" title="pules">pules</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="jp.pules.braintraining"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIAoeEhwKFmpwLnB1bGVzLmJyYWludHJhaW5pbmcQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  このアプリは認知症予防の脳トレになるだけでなく、子供とも遊べる、あるなしクイズアプリです。<p>＜あるなしクイズの遊び方＞<br>「ある」と「なし」に分けられた言葉をもとに、共通点や特徴のある点を見つけ出しましょう。<br>その共通点や特徴を元に、「ある」か「なし」かを判断してください。</p><p>＜このアプリについて＞<br>問題は全部で30問！<br>問題はランダムに出題されています。<br>問題を取得するためにインターネット接続できる必要があります。<br>簡単にTwitterで記録を報告することもできます。</p><p>【メディア掲載実績】<br>・Android apps 100<br>・ケータイWatch<br>・介護ニュース</p><p>日常生活では、脳の同じ部分を使いがちです。私も子供のときと比べるとすごく頭が固くなっています。<br>頭を柔らかくするにはクイズは簡単で良いのですが、テレビ番組のクイズはスピードが早かったりしますからじっくり脳を使えていないことがあります。</p><p>このアプリを作った理由は、私と同じようにスマートフォンで脳トレがしたいという方が多かったからです。</p><p>認知症は現時点では特効薬もなく、一度なってしまうと何事も諦める癖がつくため、治りにくい病気と言われています。<br>また、年齢が上がることで、脳は衰え、認知症になるリスクはますます高まります。</p><p>そのため、現時点で認知症になっていない方は予防することが一番です。ウォーキングをしたり、適度に脳を使うことが認知症予防になると言われています。</p><p>このアプリはそういった予防の脳トレにも使えますし、親子でも楽しめるのでコミュニケーションのきっかけにもなります。<br>いますぐアプリをインストールしてあるなしクイズを楽しみましょう！</p><p>もしよろしければアプリのご感想、ご要望をレビューに書いていただけると幸いです。 <br>よろしくお願い致します。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> <span class="paragraph-end"></span> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=jp.pules.braintraining" All letters are mixed and now you find a word and swipe it. The tiles disappear and the remaining tiles collapse into new words. The tricky bit is to remove the words in the correct order so you clear the board and complete the level.</p><p>The various themes in WordCollapse will test your knowledge - identifying words on a certain theme can be harder than you think. href="/store/apps/details?id=com.equazi.unolingo" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=com.equazi.unolingo" title="Unolingo: No Clue Crosswords"> 497.    Unolingo: No Clue Crosswords  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Equazi+Enterprizes+LLC" title="Equazi Enterprizes LLC">Equazi Enterprizes LLC</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.equazi.unolingo"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaHQobEhkKE2NvbS5lcXVhemkudW5vbGluZ28QARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  If you like crosswords or word games, then you'll love Unolingo, a fun and unique new twist on a traditional crossword puzzle. <p>Every Unolingo puzzle is a 10 x 10 crossword without clues and 26 empty squares that require the precise placement of each letter in the alphabet. </p><p>What a Sudoku puzzle is to numbers, Unolingo is to each letter of the alphabet! </p><p>Select from your choice of four difficulty levels and use your word knowledge, reasoning, and deduction skills to complete the puzzle. </p><p>Each puzzle is hand-crafted from a carefully curated list of common English words more likely to be heard at a party with friends than in the classroom. </p><p>This fascinating word puzzle can generally be completed in 5-15 minutes and is fun for the daily commuter, the casual puzzler, or the serious word buff.   </p><p>Features: <br>- 20 introductory puzzles offering hours of enjoyment with additional puzzles available in-app purchase or social media sharing. <br>- Unique hint and audit functions to help you solve the most difficult puzzles <br>- Bonus puzzles accessible by sharing your scores and achievements on Facebook <br>- Flexible design supports casual play, collaboration with friends, or time-based competition. <br>- Extensive performance statistics to monitor your progress and compare with others. </p><p>If you enjoy popular apps such as Wordfeud, Words With Friends, Sudoku, Scramble, 7 Little Words, Word Search, Scrabble or 4 Pics 1 Word, we think you'll love Unolingo.</p><p>For more information on Unolingo, visit us at Unolingo.com and follow on Twitter @unolingo. class="details"> <a class="card-click-target" href="/store/apps/details?id=org.artsplanet.android.pesotwitter" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1"></a>  <h2> <a class="title" href="/store/apps/details?id=org.artsplanet.android.pesotwitter" title="ぺそぎんトーク無料　人気の育成ゲーム風ペンギン待ち受けアプリ"> 498.    ぺそぎんトーク無料　人気の育成ゲーム風ペンギン待ち受けアプリ  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=peso.apps.pub.arts" title="peso.apps.pub.arts">peso.apps.pub.arts</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="org.artsplanet.android.pesotwitter"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaLAoqEigKIm9yZy5hcnRzcGxhbmV0LmFuZHJvaWQucGVzb3R3aXR0ZXIQARgD" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  人気キャラクター「ぺそぎん」(Pesoguin)が気ままに呟くウィジェット（Widget）です。<p>【対応機種：Android OS 1.6以降機種】</p><p>ホーム画面で「ぺそぎん」が、気ままに呟きます。<br>「ぺそぎん」の公式ボット（BOT）がツイッター上で、常に稼動しています。<br>その様子をリアルタイムに伺い知る事の出来るホームスクリーン・ウィジェットです。<br>あなたのホームスクリーン（デスクトップ）上で「ぺそぎん」が本当に生きて、生活をしているかのように感じられます。</p><p>「ぺそぎん」（ぺんぎん）をタップすると、「ぺそぎん」に話かける事が出来ます。「ぺそぎん」は話しかけられると、その話の内容に対して返事をします。　たまに（しょっちゅう？）とんちんかんな返事をしますが、そこは温かい目で見守ってください。（「ぺそぎん」は少しずつ言葉を覚えている途中です。）<br>連続して話しかけると会話を楽しむ事も出来ます。</p><p>朝は「おはよう」、夜は「おやすみ」など、まずは挨拶からはじめてみましょう。<br>「そろそろ、出かけるよ」、「もうすぐ帰宅、疲れたな～」など、自由に「ぺそぎん」へ話しかけてみましょう。「ぺそぎん」がリアクションしてくれることでしょう。<br>カジュアルな会話シミュレーションGAME（ゲーム）と育成GAME（ゲーム）を楽しんでください。</p><p>またウィジェット（アプリ）上で、ご飯をあげたり、遊んだり、「ぺそぎん」のポーズを変更してカスタマイズする事ができます。エンターテイメント性の高いアプリです。<br>※完全版（有料）では、愛用者向けにより多くのアクション、ポーズが収録されています。</p><p>フキダシをタップすると、過去の呟き（タイムライン）を確認する事が出来ます。</p><p>○ウィジェットの設定方法<br>ウィジェットを設定するには、ホームスクリーン（デスクトップ）上の空スペースをロングタップする、またはメニューボタンからウィジェット設定へ進んでください。ホーム画面に置いて癒されたり、「萌え」たりしてください。<br>（機種によってウィジェットの設定方法が異なります。）<br>当ウィジェットはホームスクリーン上に、横3マス×縦1マス分の空きスペースが必要です。</p><p>○ライブ壁紙の設定方法<br>当アプリには、ライブ壁紙も収録されています。ライブ壁紙を設定するには、ホームスクリーン（デスクトップ）上の空スペースをロングタップする、またはメニューボタンから壁紙設定へ進んでください。<br>（機種によってライブ壁紙の設定方法が異なります。）<br>ライブ壁紙に設定した後は、ホームスクリーン上の空スペース（ライブ壁紙上）をダブルタップする事で、背景（壁紙）を簡単に変更する事が出来ます。</p><p><br>※「ぺそぎん」とは、ペンギン（コウテイペンギン）の雛に似た謎の動物です。<br>ホーム画面に置いて癒されてください。</p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p><p></p> Try this:<br>Install the utility app "Auto Memory Manager" (https://market.android.com/details?id=com.lim.android.automemman&amp;hl=en), and make the following changes:<br>1) Selected the "Mild" settings.<br>2) Increase the "Hidden Application" setting to 10MB.<br>3) Power cycle your phone.<br>Note: Firecracker Software LLC is not associated with the Auto Memory Manager app.</p><p>★ How to take a screenshot:<br>- Press and hold “Volume Down” and “Power” for one full second.<br>- On certain phones, this combination is “Home” and “Power.”<br>- Very old phones running Android 2.x cannot take screenshots without the help of a 3rd-party app.</p><p>★ Having trouble with Screenshot Importing?<br>1) Completely zoom out before taking a screenshot. This way, the whole board is visible and Word Breaker can properly scan every tile.<br>2) Make sure all of your playable tiles are on the tile rack, not on the game board. This ensures the results you get are valid.<br>3) Make sure nothing is obscuring the game. Facebook Chat Heads, app trays, and notification pop-ups can all interfere with Word Breaker.</p><p>★ Is a suggested word not accepted by your favorite word game?  Check what dictionary you’re using against our recommendations below:<br>WWF: ENABLE<br>Angry Words: ENABLE<br>EA Scrabble: TWL<br>Wordfeud: TWL<br>Wordsmith: ENABLE<br>Words By Post: TWL<br>Classic   Codewords Lite  <span class="paragraph-end"></span> </a> </h2>   <div class="subtitle-container">  <a class="subtitle" href="/store/apps/developer?id=Teazel+Ltd" title="Teazel Ltd">Teazel Ltd</a>   <span class="price-container"> <span class="paragraph-end"></span>   <span class="apps is-price-tag buy-button-container" data-doc-fetch-skip-cache="0" data-doc-fetch-vouchers="0" data-docid="com.teazel.codeword.lite"> <div class="pon" style="display:none">1</div> <button class="price buy id-track-click" data-server-cookie="CAIaIgogEh4KGGNvbS50ZWF6ZWwuY29kZXdvcmQubGl0ZRABGAM=" data-uitype="223">    <span class="display-price">免費</span>   </button>    </span>     </span> </div>  <div class="description">  Codeword puzzles to keep you busy during coffee break.<br>This free version has 47 complete puzzles, all features enabled.<p>Codewords are crossword puzzles with a twist - there are no clues.</p><p>Instead, each letter A-Z is represented by a random number 1-26, with the same number representing the same letter throughout the puzzle.</p><p>All you have to do is decide which letter is represented by which number.</p><p>For example, all the 1's may be T's, all the 2's E's and so on. You are given some letters to help start off. All the letters A-Z are present in the early puzzles, with one number for each letter (later puzzles don't necessarily have all 26 letters in the grid).</p><p>The codewords grid is displayed in full. If you are really stuck then you can reveal a letter.
